 – men vi är anpassningsbara till din nuvarande situation. Viktigt för oss är att hitta rätt match och att vi alla är passionerade och tror på fokus.



  





**Vad du får – lön och equity** 




 💡 Som tidig co-founder får du
 **betydande equity** 
 i bolaget – vi bygger detta tillsammans från grunden.
 



 💰 Du får också en
 **konkurrensktraftig månadslön** 
 , med flexibiliteten att välja hur mycket av lönen du vill konvertera till ytterligare equity. Alla co-founders har samma lönenivå – vi är ett team.
 



 🚀 Ju mer du satsar på equity, desto större del äger du av framtida framgångar. Vi tror på att dela risker och belöningar rättvist.
 



  





**Så här rekryterar vi 😺⚡** 



* 📞
 **Kort samtal** 
 med en av founders – vi vill lära känna dig (och du oss)
* 🧩
 **Kort take-home exercise** 
 för att se hur du tänker kring AI-utveckling
* 👥
 **Träffas IRL** 
 och bygga något tillsammans under en betald provdag

title: Platform Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
* Azure Container Kubernetes setup
* FinOps solution for Kubernetes
* Deployment Platform setup (ArgoCD)
* Building a standardised, compliant CI/CD pipeline deployed on a Kubernetes platform, supporting multiple programming languages.
* Backstage deployment templates (making it easy to deploy new microservices)
* Getting Started Documentation Kubernetes
* Supporting GitHub migrations for internal clients transitioning from Azure DevOps, GitLab, Gerrit, and other software development platforms.
* Providing support and maintenance for the central GitHub platform and the Developer Portal, based on Backstage.


**Application deadline:** 
 08-09-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: ServiceNow Developer
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
We are looking for a ServiceNow Developer or a person with integrations experience (all levels, junior-mid-senior), who would join our ServiceNow development team. I am Carlos Morales, and I am heading the Case Management team in Telia IT. We at Telia are a global company, thus we are now building a global Telia IT. As part of new ways to work we are enabling a close cooperation of Business Units and Telia IT.
   

  

**Is this your next opportunity?**
 This is a great opportunity to be part of an agile DevOps team, working together with team colleagues in all countries where Telia operates. As a ServiceNow developer you will be part of one of Telia’s ServiceNow DevOps teams working closely with various projects and stakeholders that are representing business organization at Telia. Telia is in the middle of a huge transformation journey, and ServiceNow is a vital part of the future vision of a new generation telco.
   

  

**Is this you?**
* Communicative, excellent English spoken and written, able to describe complexity in a simplified way.
* Social, positive, open.
* Takes initiative and drives things to make it happen, pro-active, self-driven.
* Team-player always ready to share knowledge and add value to reach common goals.
* You understand and share Telia values Dare, Care, Simplify.


**Your experience:**
* Experience in ServiceNow development or a similar role.
* Experience with REST/SOAP.
* Proficiency in JavaScript.
* Used integration platforms to publishAPIs (advantage).
* Knowledge of ITIL methodologies and certification (advantage).
* Agile experience (advantage).
* University degree.
* Ability to communicate effectively with both business and technical stakeholders.
* Analytical, problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.


**We are more than a workplace**
 Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 15,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn an annual bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
   

  

 For each employee Telia has additional employee benefit package which includes:
   

  

* Health insurance and pension plans.
* Various Telia and partners discounts and offers.
* Additional vacation days.
* Workcation.
* Flexibility that enables work-life balance.
* Chance to grow both personally and professionally with our internal programs.
* Open, relaxed and fun working environment.
* Awesome colleagues across Nordic & Baltics.


 For Lithuanian applicants only: Monthly salary range for this position in Lithuania: 2,681-5,284 EUR before tax deduction.
   

  

**Interested?**
 If you fancy joining my team, apply for the job!
   

  

 Would you like to know more? Email me at carlos.morales@teliacompany.com.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application and to make sure that your personal data is kept safely, we kindly ask you to apply through our recruitment system. Please submit your CV in English. We are not able to handle resumes via e-mail or equivalent. We are looking forward to your application by 2025-09-03.
   

  

 In the last steps, required controls will be performed.
   

  

**Welcome to Telia – Let’s make better happen!**

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
📍Stockholm or Gothenburg
   

  

 📆 As soon as possible
   

  

 👩🏽‍💻 Office: 3 Days a Week
   

  

 📚 Our Recruitment Process
   

  

 At Precis, we are a group of friendly experts in media buying, analytics & marketing science, creative and technology with a joint mission to help great companies thrive in the digital landscape.
   

  

 One of our most exciting products is Alvie—a cutting-edge SaaS platform for performance marketing optimization. Designed to deliver data-driven insights for e-commerce, B2C and other companies, Alvie helps businesses fine-tune marketing strategies with precision. Launched at the end of 2024, it’s already making an impact. Check it out here!
   

  

 Are you curious to learn more about us? Read more about us here. For insights into what life is like at Precis and a peek at the perks of working with us, visit this page. In our Handbook, you can get a neat summary of who we are, our culture and our offices.
   

  

*We are committed to building an inclusive and fair workplace that attracts talent and advances its people, regardless of their background, experiences or perspectives. We believe that a diverse set of minds will continue to contribute to our innovative culture and our ability to reinvent ourselves constantly.*
**What You Will Be Doing**
 As a Senior Software Engineer, you will design, develop, and maintain high-quality software. You will collaborate with teams to drive project success and continuously improve code quality and performance.
   

  

* Design, develop, test, deploy, and maintain software solutions, ensuring high standards of quality, performance, and reliability.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, as well as product managers, architects, and other stakeholders, to understand project requirements, provide technical guidance, and ensure successful project delivery.
* Participate in code reviews, knowledge-sharing sessions, and continuous improvement initiatives to enhance team productivity and technical capabilities.
* Take ownership of individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
* Ensure high software quality and performance by applying best practices and continuously improving solutions.


**What We Are Looking For**
* 5+ years of professional software development experience, demonstrating a track record of leading complex projects, mentoring team members, and delivering scalable solutions.
* Expertise in relevant programming languages such as Python, Node.js, TypeScript, and familiarity with frameworks like ReactJS, Next.js, Flask, FastAPI, or Django.
* Experience working with NoSQL and SQL databases, with the ability to work efficiently with various data storage systems.
* Familiarity with cloud providers like GCP or AWS, as well as some experience with DevOps tools and Docker.
* Strong problem-solving skills to analyze complex technical issues and develop effective solutions, along with strategic thinking to drive innovation, improve efficiency, and ensure scalability.
* Excellent collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team and build positive relationships across different teams.
* Great interest in exploring and staying current with new technologies, with experience working on projects from ideation to production.


**Bonus Points**
* Experience with ad platforms, marketing platforms, or a strong understanding of the marketing ecosystem is an advantage.
* Experience in startup environments is also a plus!


**What We Offer**
*You can read our full offering in our* 
*handbook.*
* An intense learning environment where you will be able to grow and develop your skills and passions alongside some of the brightest minds in the industry.
* A culture that is built on collaboration, trust and innovation. We value having fun together - that’s why we also have regular afterworks, team events and a yearly festival.
* Transparent salary setting, you can find all our salary bands in our handbook. This role is an L3 under the Software Engineer column. Check it out!
* 30 days paid leave, flexible public holidays, parental pay, a solid pension scheme and key insurance. Our different offices also offer different perks such as massage, health care contributions, free book orders, healthy snacks & great coffee, EAP programs and your choice of PC or Mac.
* A diverse environment with a high focus on inclusion and belonging. We speak over 27 native languages around Precis and our internal inclusion score is 4.3 out of 5.


**We update all candidates on their applications by email. If you don't receive an email from us, please check your spam folder.**

title: Senior Fullstack Developer within eHealth
description:
Are you ready to shape the future of healthcare, social services, and elderly care in Sweden? We are building a new groundbreaking system that will revolutionize collaboration across these vital sectors. We’re now looking for a Senior Fullstack Developer with a passion for frontend development and a drive to make a real impact.
 



 Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions supports health care professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.
 



**The position**




 As part of our agile and innovative team, you will play a key role throughout the entire development lifecycle from gathering requirements to delivering high-quality, production-ready services. You will take the lead in developing a modern, API-first platform, working with test-driven development and AI-assisted workflows. Collaborating closely with designers, product owners, and domain experts, you will help create intuitive and powerful user experiences while contributing to architectural decisions that ensure scalability, performance, and security. In this role, you will also work with cutting-edge technologies and platforms, keeping you at the forefront of modern software development.
 







**W** 
**hy Join Us?** 



* Be part of a mission-driven team with the freedom to innovate.


* Work on a product that will have a real societal impact.


* Collaborate with talented colleagues in a supportive and dynamic environment.


* Enjoy flexible working conditions and opportunities for personal growth.



**Our Tech Stack** 




 You’ll be working with:
 


* **Frontend** 
 : React, TypeScript


* **Backend** 
 : Java, Spring Boot


* **Containerization & Orchestration** 
 : Docker, Kubernetes (OpenShift)


* **Development practices** 
 : TDD, CI/CD, API-first, AI-enhanced development



  

**About you** 




 To feel comfortable in this role you enjoy working in a collaborative and fast-paced environment where innovation and problem-solving go hand in hand. You are curious, open to learning and not afraid to share your ideas. Taking initiative comes naturally to you and you thrive when you can combine your technical expertise with creativity to deliver real value.
 



 At Cambio, we value initiative and personal growth. Our culture is built on Trust, Care, and Together values we believe are important to both our work and our people. It’s important to us that you recognize and identify with these values.
   





**Requirements** 
  




* Has several years of experience in fullstack development, with a strong focus on frontend technologies


* Is comfortable working in a fast-paced, exploratory environment.


* Has excellent analytical skills and enjoys solving complex problems.


* Thrives in cross-functional teams and is eager to take ownership from concept to delivery.
* Excellent communication skills in both Swedish and English



**It a bonus if you have:** 



+ Experience working with AI in your day-to-day work.



  

**Additional information:**




**Place of employment** 
 : Linköping, Motala or Stockholm
   





**Scope** 
 : Full-time, hybrid work model (three days per week in-office)
 



**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   





 We review applications and conduct interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!** 




**CAMBIO- FOR A HEALTHIER TOMORROW** 




 Welcome to a company where healthcare is improved every day. Here you will work with leading technology in a collaborative, trusting and empowering environment where your contribution will be appreciated and celebrated. In our caring culture you will have the opportunity to pursue different paths of professional growth. Seize the opportunity to do the most important work of your life
 **.** 
 Read more about us
 **here!** 




  

**A healthier tomorrow also means taking care of those who make it possible** 
**-** 
 explore our employee benefits
 



 Learn more about our recruitment process here.
 



 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at our career site.

title: Embedded C/C++ Developers
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Software Development
description:
Are you a talented
 **Embedded software** 
**C/C++ developer** 
 seeking your next opportunity? Join the Embedded Systems department in Stockholm, where exciting challenges await!
 



  





 The ALTEN Stockholm office is home to a dynamic, highly skilled team of engineers and developers from all over the world who specialize in delivering tailored solutions across sectors like automotive, telecommunications, life sciences, and IT. Known for their collaborative spirit, the team combines deep technical expertise with a proactive, problem-solving approach, fostering an environment where creativity and efficiency meet to drive impactful results for clients. With a strong focus on professional development and a supportive culture, the Stockholm team is dedicated to both individual growth and collective success, making it an exciting and empowering place to be a part of.
 



  





**WHAT WE OFFER YOU** 




 Every employee is equally valuable in the success of ALTEN! We believe in growing together by offering opportunities, development and togetherness.
 



 ALTEN operates in several different industries, having a wide variety of assignments, coaching managers and training through ALTEN Academy, which means that it will always be possible to develop at ALTEN. Your wishes will guide your way forward.
 



 As a consultant, you will get the genuine team feeling at your assignment but also a wonderful togetherness at ALTEN. Through our different internal networks, such as Women@ALTEN and ALTEN Sports you will get the opportunity to drive topics and activities that are close to your heart. At ALTEN, we think it's important to have a balance between work and spare time, which is why we offer three extra days off a year. We have a collective agreement and offer benefits like pension, insurances and wellness grants.
 



  





**WHAT WILL YOU DO** 




**Design and Develop** 
 : Create high-quality, real-time embedded software solutions in C++ for various industries.
 



**Innovate** 
 : Work on the latest technologies such as IoT, AI, and autonomous systems, contributing to exciting projects that shape the future.
 



**Collaborate** 
 : Join forces with talented engineers across multiple disciplines to deliver state-of-the-art products and systems.
 



**Problem Solve** 
 : Tackle technical challenges with creativity and out-of-the-box thinking, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
 



**Grow** 
 : Expand your knowledge through ongoing training, support, and career development within a dynamic, international environment.
 



  





**WHO ARE YOU** 



* Degree in computer science, electrical engineering, or related field.
* 3+ years in Embedded C/C++ software development within the automotive industry.
* Strong proficiency in real-time systems, and embedded platforms (ARM, FPGA, etc.).
* Python
* Bash
* Jenkins
* Classic or Adaptive AUTOSAR.
* Meritorius: experience of Yocto and Buildroot as well as with microcontrollers.



  





**ABOUT ALTEN** 




 ALTEN is one of Europe’s largest technology and IT consulting companies with over 57,000 employees in nearly 30 countries. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the value chain of the most prestigious companies in all sectors, such as Automotive, Defense, Energy & Environment, Industry, Public services & Government and Life Sciences. In Sweden, we are about 1300 committed employees with 9 offices in 9 cities - from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north. For the fifth year in a row, ALTEN has been named one of Sweden's most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen, an award for employers that offer unique career and development opportunities.

title: Business Developer
description:
Intric is accelerating its growth, driven by a fresh round of funding from investors and strong demand from both existing and new customers.
   

  

 Our platform - Intric.ai - is currently transforming how work is done, primarily within the public sector and companies that value data sovereignty, by making the power of AI accessible to a wider audience. We have secured a market-leading position in a niche of this segment.
   

  

 We are seeking a motivated individual eager to embark on the journey of a lifetime with our expanding and driven team.
   

  

**Your role**
 As a Business Developer you are at the core of the sales team, helping accelerating our growth by expanding the use of our platform to new customers.
   

  

**Who You Are**
* Passionate about business development and interested in AI
* Solution-oriented with an entrepreneurial spirit who gets things done
* Enjoy working in a fast-paced, agile environment
* We think you have 1-2 years of experience in similar roles or demonstrable achievements in relevant areas. Experience with a startup is considered extra relevant.
* Fluent in Swedish, social, driven, and eager to learn new things
* Proficiency in especially Norwegian or German, but other European languages as well is considered a strong plus (not a requirement but highly valued).


**Key Responsibilities**
 As a part of our sales team, one of your primary responsibilities is to bring our revolutionary product to both new and existing markets. This will include executing activities such as:
   

  

* Talking to potential customers and understand their needs
* Negotiating and closing deals
* Sourcing and initiating potential partnership opportunities
* Do what it takes to hit targets and deadlines, which might include proactive demand generation and finding creative ways to build the sales pipeline


**What We Offer**
* An opportunity to be a part of building a system and company that defines the future
* Rapid career development in an exciting, fast-moving sector
* Competitive compensation package combining salary and stock options

title: Embedded Software Engineer - Core OS
description:
**About Applied Intuition**
 Applied Intuition is the vehicle intelligence company that accelerates the global adoption of safe, AI-driven machines. Founded in 2017, Applied Intuition delivers the toolchain, Vehicle OS, and autonomy stacks to help customers build intelligent vehicles and shorten time to market. Eighteen of the top 20 global automakers and major programs across the Department of Defense trust Applied Intuition's solutions to deliver vehicle intelligence. Applied Intuition services the automotive, defense, trucking, construction, mining, and agriculture industries and is headquartered in Mountain View, CA, with offices in Washington, D.C., San Diego, CA, Ft. Walton Beach, FL, Ann Arbor, MI, London, Stuttgart, Munich, Stockholm, Seoul, and Tokyo. Learn more at appliedintuition.com.
   

  

*We are an in-office company, and our expectation is that employees primarily work from their Applied Intuition office 5 days a week. However, we also recognize the importance of flexibility and trust our employees to manage their schedules responsibly. This may include occasional remote work, starting the day with morning meetings from home before heading to the office, or leaving earlier when needed to accommodate family commitments. (Note: For EpiSci job openings, fully remote work will be considered by exception.)*
**Meet our engineers on the Vehicle OS team!**
 Vehicle OS is a flexible suite of products that help vehicle manufacturers develop, deploy, and update complete vehicle software and AI applications. This is one of the fastest growing projects here at Applied, and we are seeking exceptional talent to drive execution.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for senior software engineers with expertise in developing embedded software applications on production computers to build the next-generation vehicle platform! It is a unique opportunity to work on challenging engineering problems while being part of a fast-moving team.
   

  

 At Applied Intuition, you will:
   

  

* Architect and develop highly reliable embedded software
* Integrate vendor components into a common software framework, ensuring proper low-level communication (e.g., CAN, LIN, I2C, SPI, UART etc.)
* Implement real-time operating system (RTOS) applications as required for the product
* Drive custom in-vehicle infotainment device solutions
* Implement best practices in embedded AOSP development, HAL customization, and Android middleware, including maintenance and security
* Develop and customize Linux-based Android services, embedded services, and Android applications for compatibility across various Android versions and devices
* Work with cross-functional teams to bring up custom software on new devices, productionize it, and manage the process for maintaining company products


 We're looking for someone who has:
   

  

* 6+ years of experience working on embedded devices
* Strong background in embedded software development using C/C++ and assembly languages
* Hands-on experience with Android Board Support Package (BSP), Android middleware, HAL customization and maintenance
* Advanced software debugging skills, with a strong focus on low-level hardware debugging to ensure full system operation, and debugging Android Native Crashes, system crashes, and Android middleware (Drivers, HAL, Libraries, Framework)
* Experience developing software for complex embedded systems and custom SoCs, with expertise in peripheral interfaces like UART, SPI, CSI-2, I2C, GPIO, USB, and PCIe


 Nice to have:
   

  

* Prior experience in developing on-vehicle technology
* Ability to work with safety-critical robotic systems with real-time constraints
* Proficiency in embedded systems testing, with experience enhancing automated test frameworks
* Experience in creating Android device builds to support Android system development, RTOS and middleware applications, and strong knowledge of writing, modifying, and maintaining Linux services under SELinux
* Proven ability to design, integrate, and deliver code into production environments within aggressive timelines


 Compensation at Applied Intuition for eligible roles includes base salary, equity, and benefits. Base salary is a single component of the total compensation package, which may also include equity in the form of options and/or restricted stock units, comprehensive health, dental, vision, life and disability insurance coverage, 401k retirement benefits with employer match, learning and wellness stipends, and paid time off. Note that benefits are subject to change and may vary based on jurisdiction of employment.
   

  

 Applied Intuition pay ranges reflect the minimum and maximum intended target base salary for new hire salaries for the position. The actual base salary offered to a successful candidate will additionally be influenced by a variety of factors including experience, credentials & certifications, educational attainment, skill level requirements, interview performance, and the level and scope of the position.
   

  

 Please reference the job posting’s subtitle for where this position will be located. For pay transparency purposes, the base salary range for this full-time position in the location listed is: $171,000 - $264,000 USD annually.
   

  

*Don’t meet every single requirement? If you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right candidate for this or other roles.*
*Applied Intuition is an equal opportunity employer and federal contractor or subcontractor. Consequently, the parties agree that, as applicable, they will abide by the requirements of 41 CFR 60-1.4(a), 41 CFR 60-300.5(a) and 41 CFR 60-741.5(a) and that these laws are incorporated herein by reference. These regulations prohibit discrimination against qualified individuals based on their status as protected veterans or individuals with disabilities, and prohibit discrimination against all individuals based on their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin. These regulations require that covered prime contractors and subcontractors take affirmative action to employ and advance in employment individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status or disability. The parties also agree that, as applicable, they will abide by the requirements of Executive Order 13496 (29 CFR Part 471, Appendix A to Subpart A), relating to the notice of employee rights under federal labor laws.*

title: Solutions Consultant
description:
**Job Description:**
 Are you a tech-savvy problem-solver who loves turning big ideas into workable plans and can explain complex tech in plain language? Do you thrive at the intersection of business goals, user experience, and engineering? Then you may be our next Solution Consultant at Merkle!
   

  

 As Solution Consultant, you’ll be part of our Merkle Growth team doing pre-sales efforts and act as a Subject matter expert in our project deliveries.  You’ll guide clients from first conversation to delivery hand-off, shaping solutions that are feasible, scalable, and aligned with business objectives.
   

  

 The position calls for strong analytical thinking, technical experience, clear communication, and a genuine interest in modern content platforms (Sitecore, Optimizely, Adobe, WordPress, and headless stacks) as well as related systems and integrations (e.g. DAM, eCommerce platforms inc. PIM / 3PL integrations, personalization engines to name a few).
   

  

 Your curiosity extends well beyond CMSs – you closely monitor the AI space and have an interest in cloud-native architecture and technological frameworks, always eager to translate them into real-world solutions applicable for our clients.
   

  

 You will work closely with UX/UI designers, developers, project managers, and client directors, data & analysts — all with the aim of creating digital experiences that delight users and drive results.
   

  

**Your Primary Responsibilities Will Include**
* Translating our clients’ business and experience goals into clear technical requirements and roadmaps
* Leading discovery workshops and scoping sessions, breaking work into manageable pieces
* Producing effort estimates, timelines, and high-level architecture diagrams that are relevant to stakeholders can understand
* Acting as a trusted advisor during RFPs and pitches, explaining our proposed approach in a concise, compelling way
* Spotting risks and dependencies early and communicating them clearly to stakeholders
* Acting as a client-facing SME, working with developers and architects to explain to stakeholders how changing requirements impact solution feasibility.
* Staying up to date on technology trends and platform capabilities, integration patterns, and best practices to guide your recommendations


  

  

**For this role, we are looking for someone who has** 
  

  

* 3–6 years of experience as a technical project manager, senior developer, or similar hybrid role
* Experience in an advisory role and stakeholder management is required, ideally from a consultancy, agency, or software company.
* Demonstrated experience in pre-sales activities
* Hands-on experience with at least one modern DXP or CMS (for example Sitecore, Optimizely, Adobe, WordPress, or headless)
* Experience with cloud-based solutions such as AWS, Azure & GCP
* A solid grasp of agile ways of working and related tools (such as JIRA, DevOps, Confluence)
* A track record of turning fuzzy requirements into clear statements of work and estimates
* Experience in presenting to both senior executives and delivery teams, adjusting the level of detail and language as needed
* Fluency in English and Swedish


  

  

**Benefits**
* A great office in Stockholm
* Amazing colleagues who are experts in everything digital
* The flexibility and the best of both worlds – to work from home and the office.
* Excellent career opportunities within both Merkle and Dentsu
* The possibility to work with large, international clients in cross-market teams
* 30 vacation days and 5000 SEK in wellness allowance
* Incentives connected to well-being and personal development
* A strong, open culture with several events, after-works, and happenings yearly


  

  

**About Merkle**
 Merkle is a full-service, data-driven customer experience transformation agency. We partner with Top 500 companies in the Northern European region. Our Merkle NE cluster consists of four markets: Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and the Netherlands, and we operate as one unified, leading full-service digital agency to serve our Nordic markets.
   

  

 Our 700+ digital enthusiasts are innovating the way brands are built by providing expertise in Digital Transformation strategy, MarTech platforms, Creativity, UX, CRM, Data, Commerce, and CMS. Merkle is a part of dentsu, a global network of over 66,000 passionate individuals in 146 countries.
   

  

**How to apply** 
  

  

 Click Apply and upload your CV or an updated LinkedIn profile. There is no application deadline; finding the right candidate is more important to us than a speedy process. We remove the job ad when filling the position. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Senior Talent Acquisition Partner, Tine Moe, at tine.moe@merkle.com
   

  

**Location:**
 Stockholm
   

  

**Brand:**
 Merkle
   

  

**Time Type:**
 Full time
   

  

**Contract Type:**
 Permanent

title: Senior GTM Systems Analyst
description:
**Who We Are Is What We Do.**
 Deel is the all-in-one payroll and HR platform for global teams. Our vision is to unlock global opportunity for every person, team, and business. Built for the way the world works today, Deel combines HRIS, payroll, compliance, benefits, performance, and equipment management into one seamless platform. With AI-powered tools and a fully owned payroll infrastructure, Deel supports every worker type in 150+ countries—helping businesses scale smarter, faster, and more compliantly.
   

  

 Among the largest globally distributed companies in the world, our team of 6,000 spans more than 100 countries, speaks 74 languages, and brings a connected and dynamic culture that drives continuous learning and innovation for our customers.
   

  

**Why should you be part of our success story?**
 As the fastest-growing Software as a Service (SaaS) company in history, Deel is transforming how global talent connects with world-class companies – breaking down borders that have traditionally limited both hiring and career opportunities. We're not just building software; we're creating the infrastructure for the future of work, enabling a more diverse and inclusive global economy. In 2024 alone, we paid $11.2 billion to workers in nearly 100 currencies and provided healthcare and benefits to workers in 109 countries—ensuring people get paid and protected, no matter where they are.
   

  

 Our momentum is reflected in our achievements and customer satisfaction: CNBC Disruptor 50, Forbes Cloud 100, Deloitte Fast 500, and repeated recognition on Y Combinator’s top companies list – all while maintaining a 4.83 average rating from 15,000 reviews across G2, Trustpilot, Captera, Apple and Google.
   

  

 Your experience at Deel will be a career accelerator. At the forefront of the global work revolution, you'll tackle complex challenges that impact millions of people's working lives. With our momentum—backed by a $12 billion valuation and $1 B in Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) in just over five years—you'll drive meaningful impact while building expertise that makes you a sought-after leader in the transformation of global work.
   

  

 Responsibilities:
   

  

* Lead the administration and optimization of Salesforce, ensuring system stability, security, and scalability.
* Architect and manage integrations between Salesforce and GTM tools such as Gong, Outreach, Gainsight, and other sales/customer success platforms, leveraging APIs, middleware, and automation tools.
* Design, build, and maintain advanced automation solutions using Flows, Process Builder, and Apex (Triggers, Batch, and Scheduled Jobs) to enhance system efficiency and streamline business processes.
* Develop and optimize Apex code, including triggers, classes, and Lightning Components, ensuring best practices and maintainability.
* Troubleshoot complex system issues, providing expert-level support and working cross-functionally with Sales Ops, RevOps, IT, and Engineering teams.
* Drive data governance initiatives, ensuring data integrity through deduplication strategies, validation rules, and scheduled data hygiene processes.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather business requirements and translate them into scalable Salesforce configurations and custom development solutions.
* Lead and mentor junior analysts, providing technical guidance and helping them develop skills in Salesforce administration, automation, and development.
* Monitor and enhance system performance, proactively identifying bottlenecks, inefficiencies, and technical debt.
* Stay up-to-date on Salesforce releases, evaluating new features and implementing relevant improvements.
* Develop technical documentation, including system architecture, integration designs, and process workflows.


 Expectations:
   

  

* 4+ years of hands-on Salesforce experience, with expertise in Salesforce administration, automation, and Apex development.
* Strong knowledge of Salesforce architecture, data model, and security model, including profiles, roles, sharing rules, and field-level security.
* Proven experience integrating Salesforce with tools like Gong, Outreach, Gainsight, and other GTM applications using REST/SOAP APIs, middleware (e.g., Mulesoft, Workato, Fivetran), and native connectors.
* Expertise in declarative automation tools (Flow, Process Builder, Validation Rules) and Apex development (triggers, batch classes, future methods, and scheduled jobs).
* Ability to troubleshoot and debug complex Salesforce issues, optimizing performance and reducing system inefficiencies.
* Experience managing large datasets, implementing data governance best practices, and performing advanced data manipulation using SOQL and Salesforce Data Loader.
* Ability to lead system enhancement projects, working closely with RevOps, Sales Ops, and IT teams to align Salesforce with business needs.
* Mentorship experience, with a passion for coaching junior team members and fostering professional growth.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically about long-term system improvements.
* Experience with CI/CD tools, DevOps processes, and version control systems (e.g., Gearset, Copado, Git) is a plus.
* Salesforce certifications preferred, such as Salesforce Administrator, Platform Developer.


**Total Rewards**
 Our workforce deserves fair and competitive pay that meets them where they are. With scalable benefits, rewards, and perks, our total rewards programs reflect our commitment to inclusivity and access for all.
   

  

**Some things you’ll enjoy**
* Stock grant opportunities dependent on your role, employment status and location
* Additional perks and benefits based on your employment status and country
* The flexibility of remote work, including optional WeWork access


 At Deel, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that values diversity and positively encourage applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of race, religion, sex, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, pregnancy or maternity or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
   

  

*Unless otherwise agreed, we will communicate with job applicants using Deel-specific emails, which include @* 
*deel.com* 
*and other acquired company emails like @* 
*payspace.com* 
*and @* 
*paygroup.com* 
*. You can view the most up-to-date job listings at Deel by visiting* 
*our careers page* 
*.
   

  

 Deel is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to cultivating a diverse and inclusive workplace that reflects different abilities, backgrounds, beliefs, experiences, identities and perspectives.
   

  

 Deel will provide accommodation on request throughout the recruitment, selection and assessment process for applicants with disabilities. If you require accommodation, please inform our Talent Acquisition Team at recruiting@deel.com of the nature of the accommodation that you may require, to ensure your equal participation.*
 We use Covey as part of our hiring and/or promotional processes. As part of the evaluation process, we provide Covey with job requirements and candidate-submitted applications. Certain features of the platform may qualify it as an Automated Employment Decision Tool (AEDT) under applicable regulations. For positions in New York City, our use of Covey complies with NYC Local Law 144.
   

  

 We began using Covey Scout for Inbound on March 30, 2025.
   

  

 For more information about our data protection practices, please visit our Privacy Policy. You can review the independent bias audit report covering our use of Covey here: https://getcovey.com/nyc-local-law-144

title: Senior Dynamics CE Developer
description:
*Are you the developer who thrives on solving complex challenges, fine-tuning every line of code, and pushing Dynamics 365 CE beyond its limits? Join Dustin’s Dynamics team to shape the future of Dynamics 365 in an international setup.*
*We are* 
 looking for someone who lives to code, thrives on technical challenges and loves diving deep into the guts of Dynamics 365, Azure integrations and custom business logic.
   

  

**This is what makes the position as Senior Dynamics 365 CE Developer unique**
* A senior role designed for developers who want full ownership of code and innovation.
* Take ownership of designing and delivering innovative technical solutions that drive business transformation.
* A collaborative environment where a "win as a team" attitude prevails, fostering growth and success collectively.


 You will be part of the Dynamics team, with current operations live in BNLX and an exciting project underway in the Nordics. We encourage a welcoming and collaborative environment, with a mix of personalities and an international team, ensuring everyone works together to achieve success.
   

  

*Read more about Dustin here*
**Your role & influence as Senior Dynamics 365 CE Developer**
*Responsibility* 
 : You will play a crucial role in designing, developing and implementing solutions within the Dynamics 365 CE platform to meet the business requirements. This role includes managing releases, coordinating connected ISVs, ensuring code quality, maintaining Dynamics environments, troubleshooting issues, and driving technical excellence.
   

  

*Collaboration* 
 : You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver seamless Dynamics 365 CE solutions and technical releases, ensuring high-quality outcomes.
   

  

 This role requires a strong understanding of Microsoft technologies, CRM development expertise, and the ability to analyse complex business requirements to propose efficient solutions.
   

  

**Core Activities**
* Write high-quality, high-performance and maintainable code, and ensuring smooth solution releases.
* Conducting design reviews, troubleshooting, and maintaining environment stability.
* Collaborating to align technical solutions with business requirements in line with industry best practices.


**Benefits of** 
**joining Dustin**
 We believe there's more to Dustin than just the benefits listed here. You'll fully understand this once you're with us.
   

  

 You can find more of our Swedish benefits below in the vacancy.
   

  

**This** 
**is what we imagine you bring**
 We envision you as a curious and driven individual who combines senior-level expertise in Dynamics 365 CE, .NET, C#, JavaScript/TypeScript, Power Platform, and Azure DevOps with excellent communication skills and a passion for collaboration and problem-solving.
   

  

**Additionally, It's Nice That You Have**
* Bachelor's degree level of working and thinking and 5 years’ or more experience of similar job.
* Experience with API integrations, Dual Write, and release pipelines.
* Strong technical skills in Azure services like Azure Functions, Logic Apps, and Service Bus.
* Proficiency with SQL Server and related database management tasks.


**What** 
**can you expect next?**
 To Ensure a Fair Recruitment Process Free From Unconscious Bias, We Handle Your Application Anonymously And Do Not Accept Cover Letters. Please Refrain From Sending One, So That The Selection Is Based Solely On Professional Competencies. We Expect The Following Steps In The Recruitment Process
   

  

* Telephone screening with Talent Acquisition Partner, Karishma Sindhu.
* First interview with Hiring Manager, Mirjam Stegeman and a colleague.
* Technical (Second) interview with future colleagues from the team.
* A possible final Interview with Director Application Management, Sara Wennerström.
* Professional References.


******Please note that for this specific job, we don´t provide any relocation or work permit sponsorship support.******
**About**
**Read more about how to become a** 
**Dustineer**
 For questions about the position, please contact the Talent Acquisition Partner, Karishma Sindhu via karishma.sindhu@dustin.com.

title: Quality Assurance Medical Devices - Gothenburg
description:
**🚀 Join VIPAS AB as a 🚀**
**Are you ready to thrive in the dynamic world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB is on the lookout for passionate, driven professionals to join our growing team and take on exciting new projects across Sweden.**
**About VIPAS AB**
 At VIPAS AB, we believe technology should empower businesses—not complicate them. We’re an IT consulting company that delivers smart, scalable, and tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java, Python, and Cloud platforms. Our expertise spans: Software Development, DevOps & Automation, Embedded Systems, Manufacturing Enginering, Mechanical Enginering, Android & Mobile Solutions, Project Management & Engineering and so on.
   

  

 We’re not just consultants—we’re strategic partners guiding organizations through digital transformation with confidence and clarity.
   

  

 Your Role
   

  

 We are looking for a
 **QA Consultant** 
 to support one of our customers within the
 **medical devices** 
 sector. In this role, you will play a key part in ensuring compliance with applicable regulatory requirements and driving continuous improvements within the Quality Management System (QMS).
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Participate and contribute to strategic planning and decision-making related to QMS.
* Identify, define, and implement improvement opportunities within QMS processes
* Review and approve quality procedures in line with ISO, MDSAP, and MDR 2017/745 requirements.
* Lead and drive investigations related to non-conformities (NCs) and Corrective and Preventive Actions (CAPAs).
* Review Change Requests (CR) and Change Order checklists concerning QA.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to approve temporary non-conformities.


**Requirements:**
* Full-time assignment.
* Hybrid setup possible, with at least 60% onsite presence required.
* Start date: ASAP.


**Desired Competences**
* Strong experience in Quality Assurance, Test, and Validation within medical devices.
* Proven knowledge of applicable regulatory frameworks (ISO, MDSAP, MDR 2017/745).
* Ability to collaborate effectively across different functions and drive QA initiatives.


 Why VIPAS AB?
   

  

 At VIPAS AB, we don’t just offer jobs—we build careers. Here’s why top IT professionals choose us:
   

  

* 📄 Secure & Transparent Employment We follow the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement, ensuring fair compensation, benefits, and long-term stability.
* 🌍 Diverse Industry Exposure Work on high-impact projects across Telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking, gaining experience that spans multiple sectors.
* 🚀 Accelerated Career Growth Whether you're a seasoned developer or an emerging tech leader, we offer continuous learning, challenging assignments, and leadership opportunities to help you grow fast and grow smart.
* 🤝 Culture of Collaboration & Curiosity Join a team that values innovation, inclusion, and integrity. At VIPAS, your ideas matter, your voice is heard, and your growth is celebrated.


 How to Apply
   

  

 Ready to make an impact? Send your
 **resume and cover letter** 
 to
 **pooja@vipas.se** 
 . We review applications continuously—so don’t wait!
   

  

**Note** 
 :
 **Only candidates with Sweden PR/citizenship or a valid work permit will be considered.**
 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. So if a role speaks to you, apply immediately!

title: Salesforce System Owner
job_function: Information Technology, Project Management, and Sales
company_industry: Software Development, Manufacturing, and IT System Custom Software Development
description:
*Are you a Salesforce professional with development skills? Do you enjoy owning and optimizing systems end-to-end? Join Tacton as our Salesforce System Owner, where you'll play a pivotal role in scaling our Salesforce ecosystem to support our growing business operations.* 




  





**About The Role** 




 You'll be part of our Revenue Operations team, collaborating cross-functionally with a group of engaged and talented colleagues. You’ll place yourself in the shoes of internal business users, work with process flow charts to help visualize problems and proposed solutions, leverage AI to be more efficient and own/deliver the changes that need to be made – In short, you will be the Salesforce subject matter expert that has the platform expertise to drive change!
 



  





**What You’ll Be Doing** 



* Platform Ownership: Manage the full Salesforce platform, including user management, permissions, profiles, roles, and record types.
* Declarative Automation: Design, build, and optimize Salesforce Flows, validation rules, formula fields, and Lightning UI enhancements.
* Programmatic Development: Develop and maintain Apex classes, triggers, and test methods to support custom business logic.
* Governance & Documentation: Ensure platform governance, maintain comprehensive documentation, and uphold scalability best practices.
* Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with Sales, Marketing, Customer Success, and Product teams to gather requirements and implement solutions.
* What You Bring Experience: Hands-on Salesforce experience in a combined Admin/Developer role.
* Technical Skills: Proficiency in Salesforce Flows, Apex development, and data management.
* Platform Knowledge: Solid understanding of the Salesforce data model, security model, and platform limits.
* Tools Familiarity: Experience with tools like Data Loader and VS Code.
* Languages: Excellent communication skills in English, both spoken and written.



  





**Qualifications (not a Requirement)** 



* Salesforce certifications (e.g., Platform Developer I, Admin).
* Knowledge of JavaScript, Python, or other scripting languages.
* Marketing Automation (e.g., Pardot, Hubspot)
* Middleware (e.g., Mulesoft, Workato)
* CPQ (e.g., Zuora, Kugamon, Tacton)
* DocGen (e.g., Docusign)
* Revenue Intelligence (Gong, Salesloft, Outreach, ZoomInfo)



  





**Who You Are** 




 We’re looking for someone who is eager to understand our business, who brings strong initiative and a passion for continuous improvement and development. In this role, you’ll collaborate with colleagues across all functions and roles – so being an excellent collaborator and communicator is key.
 



**What We Offer** 



* Ownership: Full ownership of a strategic, business-critical platform.
* Culture: A collaborative, open, and inclusive culture built on trust and innovation.
* Impact: The opportunity to make a tangible difference across teams.
* Benefits: 33 vacation days, private healthcare insurance, a generous wellness allowance, and more.



**About Tacton** 




 Tacton is a global SaaS leader in CPQ (Configure, Price, Quote), empowering manufacturers to streamline complex sales processes and drive growth. Headquartered in Stockholm with offices in Chicago, Karlsruhe, and Warsaw, we’re a 220-person team on an exciting growth journey. Recognized by Gartner as a market leader, our technology helps global manufacturers solve real-world configuration challenges and stay competitive in a rapidly changing world. Learn more at tacton.com/about
 



 Tacton is a leading SaaS company within CPQ and Design Automation making sales simple for complex products.

title: Data Steward - OKQ8 Tech
description:
*Hela samhället ställer om mot en fossilfri framtid. Vi vill visa vägen i utvecklingen av vår bransch, så att fler kan ta sig fram, ta hand om sitt fordon och driva verksamheter med ett så lågt klimatavtryck som möjligt. Vill du vara med och bidra till hållbar utveckling, på riktigt? Välkommen att följa med på vår resa!*
 Som Data Steward hos oss kommer du att få ansvar kring Master Data Managment (MDM) samt även vara produktspecialist för vår MDM plattform Profisee. Detta är en avgörande roll för implementeringen av Profisee, OKQ8:s masterdatastrategi i allmänhet samt för vår strategi att bli ännu mer datadrivna.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 OKQ8 har idag en diversifierad verksamhet med en stor mängd system som tillhandahåller data och transaktioner. I detta brokiga landskap nyckeln till ordning och reda fungerande masterdata och en enhetlig källa till sanningen. Här blir Profisee en viktig komponent till övriga plattformar samt till Data och Analytics som inom OKQ8 till största del bygger på Microsofts komponenter såsom exempelvis Power BI, Fabric, Power Platform, Azure Synapse etc.
   

  

 Som Data Steward kommer du att:
   

  

* Säkerställa att data är korrekt, aktuell och tillförlitlig
* Definiera och tillämpa policyer, standarder och procedurer för datahantering
* Ansvara hela livscykeln såsom insamling, lagring, användning och arkivering
* Skapa och underhålla metadata för att underlätta förståelsen av data
* Säkra att datahanteringen följer lagar, regler och interna policyer
* Fungera som en länk mellan Tech och verksamheten för att säkerställa att data används på ett korrekt och ändamålsenligt sätt
* Delta i initiativ och projekt för att förbättra vår data samt bidra till utvecklingen av framtida tekniska lösningar för informationsförsörjning


 Samt som Profisee Produktspecialist kommer du att:
   

  

* Vara vår expert för MDM-plattformen Profisee
* Hantera installation, konfiguration och förbättringar för att möta verksamhetens behov
* Samarbeta nära våra Tech team för att integrera Profisee med andra system och säkerställa att dataflöden överensstämmer med bästa praxis
* Tillhandahålla utbildning och kunskapsdelning för interna team
* Skapa automatiserade arbetsflöden och pipelines för att hämta, organisera och transformera data från olika källor


 Vi tror att du är fokuserad, lösningsorienterad och analytisk. Du kan arbeta självgående och du brinner för ditt område och vill ha möjligheter att vidareutvecklas. Du tar eget ansvar för att hitta lösningar, driver ständiga förbättringar och håller deadlines.
   

  

**För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har/är:**
* Högskoleexamen i datavetenskap, informationsteknologi eller ett närliggande område
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av Master Data Management, inklusive praktisk erfarenhet som Data Steward
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av Profisee plattformen som produktspecialist.
* Kommunikationsförmåga för att samarbeta med tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter
* Goda kunskaper i engelska och svenska samt gärna i danska


 Det hade även varit bra om du har:
   

  

* Kunskaper kring Azure, Fabric, Master Data Services
* God kunskap inom Power BI, Fabric, Power Platform, Azure Synapse
* God kunskap inom ordinarie MS 365-applikationer
* Kunskap kring andra MDM- eller datastyrningsplattformar
* Erfarenhet och intresse av statistik, Machine Learning och AI
* Erfarenhet som Data Engineer, Data Developer, Data Scientist eller liknande


 Vi uppmuntrar dig att ansöka även om du inte känner att du uppfyller alla ovan nämnda kvalifikationer. Det viktigaste är att du har ett starkt driv, engagerad, skärpt och vill vara med och bidra till hållbar utveckling på riktigt!
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Jörgen Forsman via
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 Hos oss på OKQ8 får du arbeta i en flexibel miljö med viktiga och varierande arbetsuppgifter. Vi uppmuntrar samarbete, innovation och utveckling – och vi tror på att vi tillsammans gör varandra bättre. Här blir du en del av en familjär kultur där vi stöttar varandra, har roligt tillsammans och där du ges möjlighet att växa och göra skillnad. Vi vill vara ett företag som speglar samhället, med en inkluderande kultur som minskar utanförskap och främjar mångfald.
   

  

*I rekryteringsprocessen ingår både psykometriska tester och kompetensbaserade intervjuer, med syfte att främja en rättvis utvärdering för alla kandidater.*
 För den här tjänsten behöver du vara medborgare i ett EU/EES-land eller ha permanent uppehållstillstånd i Sverige.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan!** 
 Om företaget
 **Ditt livs kanske viktigaste jobb. På riktigt.**
 Vi vet att det är en vågad sak att säga, men vi menar verkligen varje ord. Oavsett om det handlar om ditt första jobb, ditt sista jobb, eller om du har modet att anta en ny utmaning, tror vi att du kan få ditt livs kanske viktigaste jobb här hos oss. På riktigt.

title: Fullstack Utvecklare – C#/.NET och React
description:
**Om oss** 




 Stockholm Stream Media AB utvecklar och driver Delta – en molnbaserad SaaS-tjänst för videohantering och distribution till några av världens största streamingplattformar, inklusive Apple TV+, Amazon Prime, Vimeo, Comcast och Roku.
 



 Vår plattform hanterar över 30 000 filmer och används idag av fler än 20 kunder globalt. Vi är "Preferred Technology Vendor" i Amazon Prime’s Exclusive Global Program. Vi är ett växande och lönsamt techbolag med kontor i Alvik i Stockholm, och ett tight team på 6 personer.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Vi söker nu en utvecklare med minst 3 års erfarenhet som vill jobba med en avancerad produkt i ett bolag där teknik, streaming och internationella kunder står i centrum. Du blir en viktig del av vårt utvecklingsteam där du får arbeta med hela kedjan – från databas till gränssnitt – i en modern teknikstack. 
 



  





**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Förbättra och utveckla nya funktioner i vår SaaS-tjänst Delta
* Förbättra hantering av video, metadata, bilder och undertexter
* Arbeta med integrationer mot externa tjänster och plattformar
* Bidra till kodkvalitet, testning och CI/CD-processer
* Delta i tekniska diskussioner kring arkitektur och förbättringar



  





**Vi tror att du har:** 



* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling
* Goda kunskaper i C# och .NET
* Goda kunskap i React eller annat frontend-ramverk
* Erfarenhet av databaser som PostgreSQL eller MSSQL
* Vana av att jobba med testning, CI/CD och container-lösningar
* Grundläggande förståelse för molntjänster, gärna AWS
* Goda kunskaper i engelska, i både tal och skrift



  





**Meriterande:** 



* Erfarenhet av videohantering, t.ex. transkodering eller streamingformat
* Erfarenhet av AWS CloudFormation eller AWS CDK
* Erfarenhet av Nomad eller ECS
* Erfarenhet inom UX



  





**Vi erbjuder:** 



* Konkurrenskraftiga villkor
* Internationell miljö med både globala kunder och kollegor
* Stora möjligheter att påverka produkt och arbetssätt
* En självständig roll i ett växande techbolag med korta beslutsvägar
* Trevligt kontor i Alvik och möjlighet till hybridarbete



  





**Ansökan och kontakt** 




 Patrik Littmann, VD och grundare
 



 patrik.littmann@stockholmstream.com

title: Systemutvecklare Backend
description:
**Techster Solutions** 
 befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst
 **5+** 
 års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
   

  

 Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
   

  

**Rollbeskrivning** 
 :
   

  

***Till vår kund söker vi tre Systemutvecklare Backend till Digital Kundupplevelse.***
 Vill du bygga smarta API:er och moderna backend-tjänster som gör verklig skillnad för miljontals kunder? Nu har du chansen att vara med och forma nästa generations digitala kundupplevelse.
   

  

 Vi är mitt i en spännande transformation där vi lämnar gamla system bakom oss och bygger upp något nytt: en plattform baserad på moderna, återanvändbara komponenter, affärsflöden och API:er.
   

  

 Bolaget kanske är över 100 år gamla, men vår tech stack är allt annat än dammig. Hos oss får du vara med och bygga upp en modern mikrotjänstarkitektur – där REST API:er, mikrotjänster och eventdriven kommunikation kommer att samverka på OpenShift. Du får vara med från grunden och påverka tekniska beslut som faktiskt betyder något – både för vår arkitektur och för våra kunder.
   

  

**Vi söker just nu tre systemutvecklare** 
 Java till sektionen Digital Kundupplevelse inom följande avdelningar:
   

  

* Erbjudande & Försäljning
* Kund & Avtal


**Det här gör du som systemutvecklare på Digital Kundupplevelse:**
 Som utvecklare hos oss får du en nyckelroll i att utveckla och konsolidera våra backend-tjänster och applikationer för att öka återanvändbarheten och förbättra kundupplevelsen samt bygga upp vår digitala plattform. Hos oss befinner du dig mitt i ett snabbt växande digitalt landskap där vi utvecklar självbetjäningstjänster och möter våra kunder professionellt och personligt via olika digitala och innovativa alternativ. Det du utvecklar kommer vara oerhört viktigt och synligt för alla våra miljoner kunder - här kan just du göra skillnad!
   

  

**Som systemutvecklare hos oss är du med och:**
* Bygger moderna lösningar i Java Spring Boot
* Utvecklar robusta REST API:er
* Utvärderar och sätter upp eventdrivna integrationer med Kafka
* Säkerställer hög kvalitet genom CI/CD och automatiserade flöden
* Driftsätter och skalar lösningar på OpenShift


**Är du den vi söker?**
 Har en nyfiken inställning till både teknik och människor och gillar att utforska nya lösningar och utmana gamla sanningar. Du bidrar till en öppen och prestigelös kultur där man vågar fråga, dela med sig och fira framsteg – och lära sig av sina misstag. Du tror på teamets kraft, men tar också ansvar för din egen utveckling och leverans.
   

  

 Du har jobbat med systemutveckling i minst fem år och känner dig hemma i ett modernt DevOps-tänk där kvalitet, leverans och innovation går hand i hand. Du är flytande i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Tror du att du är
 **Techster Solutions** 
 nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Arbetsplats och kultur
   

  

 Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
   

  

 Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Molnarkitekt
description:
**Utveckla framtiden med oss**
 Omegapoint är ett ledande konsultföretag som skapar framtidens digitala tjänster. Vi är kända för vår förmåga att integrera säkerhet i våra systemutvecklingsuppdrag, vilket gör oss till ett förstahandsval för många kunder. Nu söker vi fler IT-arkitekter för att stärka vårt team och vår leveranskapacitet ytterligare.
   

  

**Är du den vi söker?**
 Som molnarkitekt på Omegapoint har du ett djupt intresse för moderna molnlösningar och har en stark grund i åtminstone en av de större molnleverantörerna, AWS, Azure eller/och GCP. Med en bakgrund inom utveckling är du inte främmande för tanken att även skriva kod när det behövs. Ditt intresse inom säkerhet gör att våra kunder kan känna sig trygga i att de system du och ditt team bygger håller hög kvalitet. Som person är du positiv och älskar att dela med dig och lyfta andra.
   

  

**Din roll som molnarkitekt på Omegapoint**
**Som Molnarkitekt Hos Oss Kan Dina Arbetsuppgifter Inkludera**
* Att leda ett team med ansvar för arkitekturen
* Att arbeta som utvecklare och aktivt bidra till arkitekturarbetet
* Att fungera som expertstöd i molnrelaterade frågor såsom säkerhet, migrering och arkitektur


 I din roll är du lösningsorienterad och förstår vikten av balans mellan elegans och leverans. Du ser till att stakeholders förstår hur projekt fortskrider och vilka hinder och risker som föreligger.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Omegapoint grundades 2001 och är Norra Europas ledande konsultbolag inom cybersäker digitalisering. Med en vision om en framtid där vi fullt ut kan lita på teknik använder vi vår expertis för att säkra våra kunders och medarbetares utveckling. Vi är vassa och snälla, något som karaktäriseras av vår kompetensutvecklingskultur och viljan att dela vår kunskap med varandra. För närvarande är vi över 900 anställda konsulter i Stockholm, Oslo, Drammen, Köpenhamn, Göteborg, Malmö, Örebro, Västerås, Enköping, Uppsala, Umeå och Montreal.
   

  

**Vi satsar på dig** 
**- skapa framtiden tillsammans med oss!** 
**🚀**
 Omegapoint är inte bara en arbetsplats – det är en gemenskap där innovation, säkerhet och teknisk spetskompetens möts. Vi vågar lova dig en arbetsplats där du ges mängder med möjligheter att fortsätta utvecklas. Här får du möjlighet att arbeta med utvecklande projekt inom cybersäkerhet, digital transformation och systemutveckling, tillsammans med andra kunniga och engagerade experterna.
   

  

**Utveckling och lärande** 
 : På Omegapoint investeras det kontinuerligt i din personliga och professionella utveckling. Genom skräddarsydda utbildningsprogram, mentorskap och konferenser får du ständig möjlighet att växa och utmana dig själv.
   

  

**Innovationsdrivet:** 
 Vi är ledande inom cybersäker digitalisering. Du kommer att vara en del av en organisation som ligger i framkant och driver förändring inom teknik, där varje medarbetares idéer och insatser bidrar till att skapa säkra och hållbara digitala lösningar.
   

  

**Gemenskap:** 
 Arbetsmiljön på Omegapoint präglas av öppenhet och samarbete. Här uppmuntras du att ta initiativ, vara nyfiken och tänka utanför boxen. På våra kontor ordnar vi mängder av aktiviteter under året för att alltid fortsätta utvecklas och ligga i framkant. Det är en del i vår kompetenskultur som bygger på samarbete och en vilja att stärka varandra.
   

  

 Är du intresserad av teknologi, säkerhet och innovation, vill vara en del av ett bolag där dina insatser verkligen spelar roll, och där dina kollegor är både vassa och snälla? Då är Omegapoint platsen för dig!
   

  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!**

title: C#/.NET-utvecklare
description:
**Arbetsbeskrivning**
 Vill du arbeta med avancerade system i en miljö som kombinerar startup-känsla med stabiliteten från en stor koncern? Vi söker en engagerad och driven C#/.NET-utvecklare till ett av våra fintech-team!
   

  

 Du blir en nyckelperson i ett team som arbetar med att utveckla digitala verktyg för finansiell rådgivning och löne- och förmånshantering. Plattformen är byggd på en modern, mikrotjänstbaserad och eventdriven arkitektur i Microsoft Azure, vilket ger dig en unik möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken, helt fri från legacy-system.
   

  

**Ansvarsområde**
 Vi letar efter dig som brinner för att arbeta i en tekniskt modern miljö där du får möjlighet att påverka och bidra till utvecklingen av en affärskritisk plattform. Du uppskattar en agil och innovativ arbetskultur och drivs av att leverera högkvalitativa lösningar.
   

  

**Vi Ser Gärna Att Du Har**
* Flera års erfarenhet av C# och .NET.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med molntjänster, helst Microsoft Azure.
* Kunskap om mikrotjänstarkitektur och eventdrivna system.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med databaser som Azure SQL.
* Meriterande med erfarenhet av Masstransit, React eller TypeScript.


 Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och bygga framtiden med oss? Ansök idag!
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Som en del av vårt prestigelösa team på fyra utvecklare fokuserar du främst på backend-utveckling och att forma arkitekturen för vår plattform. Din expertis kommer att vara avgörande för hur vi löser komplexa affärsproblem med elegant och skalbar kod.
   

  

* Designa, utveckla och underhålla backend-system i .NET.
* Arbeta med arkitekturen för vår mikrotjänstbaserade plattform i Azure.
* Samarbeta nära med teamet för att designa och implementera nya funktioner.
* Säkerställa att kodbasen är ren, testbar och effektiv.

title: Senior AI-utvecklare
description:
**🌟 Vill du vara med och skapa framtidens AI-lösningar?
   

  

 Hos oss får du arbeta med den senaste tekniken inom AI och generativ AI – i ett team där innovation, samhällsnytta och personlig utveckling står i fokus. Vi söker dig som brinner för data, teknik och att lösa komplexa problem tillsammans med engagerade kollegor. Välkommen till en arbetsplats där idéer får ta plats och där du är med och gör skillnad på riktigt.**
**Vi arbetar med olika projekt inom AI och generativ AI, samt utför traditionell dataanalys. Vi använder flera plattformar men mycket sker inom Microsofts AI Plattform med t.ex Azure Open AI, Azure AI Foundry och Copilot Studio. Utöver detta så hjälper vi även kunder på ett strategiskt plan med rådgivning, AI-Strategier och AI-Policys.**
 Vi har en spännande tid framför oss med en ökad efterfrågan och nya uppdrag inom AI. Det gör gör att vi behöver förstärka vårt
 **Data Analytics och AI-team** 
 . Vi söker personer med erfarenhet inom dataanalys/AI och gärna med kompetens inom Microsofts AI Plattform. Med starkt samarbete med Microsoft och andra plattformar erbjuder vi spännande framtidsutsikter och projekt i våra leveransteam.
   

  

**Vad du kommer att göra hos oss?**
 Som Senior AI-utvecklare kommer du ingå i ett av våra utvecklingsteam som arbetar agilt med ny-och vidareutveckling. Du jobbar själv eller i grupp på ett eller flera uppdrag. Det finns även möjlighet att prova annat än AI då våra projekt innehåller en mängd olika plattformar och tekniker. Tillsammans med dig och din egen utvecklingsplan finns det möjligheter att utvecklas inom många områden.
   

  

 Rollen som senior AI-utvecklare hos oss innebär ett varierat och brett arbetsområde där du aktivt deltar i forskning och utveckling (R&D), utforskar och testar nya tekniker samt bidrar med kreativa lösningar på komplexa problem. Du får utrymme att prova nya idéer, utvärdera innovationer och arbeta tvärfunktionellt, vilket gör att du kontinuerligt utvecklas och är med och formar framtidens AI-lösningar.
   

  

 Som Senior AI-utvecklare tar du ansvar för att lösa en uppgift och är även bekväm med att ta fram lösningsförslag, tänka ut en design eller lösa arktitekturfrågor. Du tycker om att jobba tillsammans med övriga i ditt team och att dela med dig av dina erfarenheter. Du är även bekväm med att handleda mer juniora kollegor . Då vi utvecklar våra AI-lösningar tillsammans med kund så ska du vara van vid att löpande kundkontakt.
   

  

**Vi ser att du:**
 – Har Högskole- eller universitetsutbildning, sannolikt inom AI, system- och/eller datavetenskap eller motsvarande utbildning. Du behärskar Python väl och/eller har erfarenhet inom Microsofts AI Stack med t.ex Azure OPEN AI, Foundry, Fabric och Copilot Studio.
   

  

 – Har jobbat inom IT helst med mjukvaruutveckling i minst 7 år
   

  

 – Behärskar SQL för databearbetning och dataanalys
   

  

 – Gillar siffror, data och AI
   

  

 – Inte tvekar att ta itu med utmaningar och ny teknik
   

  

 – Har erfarenhet av modern utvecklingsmetodik
   

  

 – Har kommunikativ förmåga och utrycker dig väl i svenska och engelska både i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Vi tror också att du är erfaren inom flera av nedanstående områden:**
 – Gärna jobbat med dataflöden och data management
   

  

 – HTML/Javascript/Typescript/Angular
   

  

 – Andra språk som .Net
   

  

 – MS Fabric, MS Factory, Power BI
   

  

 – Integrationer
   

  

 – WebAPI
   

  

 – Molntjänster exempelvis Azure
   

  

 – Git, TFS
   

  

 – NoSQL, GraphDB eller liknande
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig:**
 – Att tillsammans med andra bygga viktiga saker, som spelar roll
   

  

 – Friskvårdsbidrag, kollektivavtal, tjänstepension och brett utbud av aktiviteter
   

  

 – Flexibel arbetstid och balans mellan arbete & fritid
   

  

 – Stark kollegial anda i ekonomiskt stabilt företag.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Vi på Softronic jobbar ständigt med att förﬂytta våra kunder mot morgondagens teknik. Vare sig det handlar om att utveckla AI, automatisera processer eller modernisera en äldre lösning med bibehållen tillgänglighet. En annan sida av det vi gör är att vi hjälper våra kunder att utveckla innovativa och driftsäkra tjänster som skapar samhällsnytta genom att förenkla människors liv och jobb. På så sätt blir vi och vår teknik en positiv kraft i samhället och en del i att göra världen lite mer hållbar. Det är det vi kallar GoodTech.
   

  

 Vi ser arbetet och arbetsplatsen som en av flera energigivande delar i människans liv. Därför odlar vi aktivt en kultur av gemenskap och lust, där brädspelskvällar, löprundor med kollegorna längs vattnet eller en ﬁka på terrassen är viktigt och ska få lov att ta plats. Genom gemenskap och samhörighet blir det också enklare att tillsammans vidareutveckla våra förmågor, för att i förlängningen kunna vässa vårt erbjudande mot våra kunder.

title: Senior .NET-utvecklare & AI
description:
*Är du en passionerad utvecklare med en stark vilja att utforska och få till innovation med den senaste tekniken? Vi söker en erfaren utvecklare som vill vara en del av ett nydanande och explorativt team inom GenAI, Agenter och Maskininlärning. Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och arbeta med banbrytande teknik, då är detta möjligheten för dig!*
**Om jobbet**
 Som Senior .NET-utvecklare kommer du att ha en nyckelroll i att forma och driva utvecklingen av våra tekniska lösningar. Du kommer att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där innovation och nytänkande är i fokus. Ditt arbete kommer att vara både strategiskt och operativt, med ansvar för att säkerställa att våra system är robusta, skalbara och framtidssäkra. Du kommer att ha möjlighet att utforska och implementera avancerade teknologier inom AI och maskininlärning, och bidra till att skapa intelligenta och självlärande system som kan revolutionera vår verksamhet.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer vara bland annat:
   

  

* Fullstack-utveckling med .NET (version 8/9) för Azure
* Utveckling med C#
* Användning av React, TypeScript, microfrontend
* Testdriven/testfokuserad utveckling
* Integration med synkrona och asynkrona mönster
* Mjukvaruarkitektur
* Bygga CI/CD-pipeline med Azure som målplattform
* Automation
* Användning av Bicep


**Vem är du?**
 Följande kommer göra dig framgångsrik i denna tjänst:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av fullstack-utveckling med .NET (version 8/9) för Azure
* Kunskaper i C#
* Erfarenhet av React, TypeScript, microfrontend
* Erfarenhet av testdriven/testfokuserad utveckling
* Erfarenhet av integration med synkrona och asynkrona mönster
* Kunskaper i mjukvaruarkitektur
* Erfarenhet av att bygga CI/CD-pipeline med Azure som målplattform
* Erfarenhet av automation
* Kunskaper i Bicep


 Meriterande är även om du har:
   

  

* Försäkringskunskap
* Förståelse för försäkringsverksamhets behov av följsamhet mot regelverk
* Erfarenhet av AI/ML/NLP/Agenter
* Kunskaper i Langchain, Semantic Kernel, OpenAI Swarm eller motsvarande


 Som person är du drivande, resultatfokuserad och nyfiken. Du har förmåga att arbeta självständigt och i team, och du utmärker dig genom gott självledarskap och stark samarbetsförmåga. Du har ordning och reda och kan dokumentera på en lagom nivå.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Hos oss på Agria blir du en del av gruppen Kompetenscenter, där vi tillsammans skapar en arbetsmiljö som främjar trivsel, lärande och personlig utveckling. Kompetenscenter ansvarar för bemanning och kompetens i vår virtuella leveransorganisation, med skickliga utvecklare, produktägare, affärsanalytiker, kravledare, QA-testare och Scrum Masters. Vi arbetar på vårt nyrenoverade kontor på Gärdet i Stockholm, där vi erbjuder en flexibel arbetsmiljö för att balansera arbete och vardag.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder unika förmåner som aktiviteter med vår kamrat-, konst- eller idrottsförening, träning i vårt fullt utrustade gym, och god mat i vår personalrestaurang till subventionerat pris. Dessutom har vi ett hundkontor! Som en del av Länsförsäkringsgruppen får du även förmånliga bankerbjudanden, rabatter på djur- och sakförsäkringar och personlig pensionsrådgivning.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till vårt team och tillsammans skapa trygghet för fler djur och dess ägare.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-09-14**
*Välkommen till Agria Djurförsäkring – en plats där vi skapar trygghet för djur och människor. Allt vi gör, gör vi för djuren. Det genomsyrar hela vår medarbetarkultur och märks i alla beslut vi fattar. Vi tror på att människor med en genuin passion för djur är nyckeln till att förmedla vårt erbjudande och att upprätthålla våra mål, mission och löften.*
