title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&O Azure Technical Architect
description:
**About Piab Group:** 




 At Piab Group, we improve our customers' productivity, sustainability, and safety through evolving industrial automation and have done so since 1951. We believe in an automated world where no resources are wasted, and no humans are injured. With annual sales of ~3 billion SEK and more than 1200 employees, Piab is a global organisation, serving customers in more than 100 countries from a vast network of subsidiaries and channel partners. Since 2018, Piab Group has been owned by Patricia Industries, part of Investor AB.
 



  





**What awaits you at our company:** 



* **Innovative Culture:** 
 Be part of a team that thrives on entrepreneurship and innovation.
* **Global Impact:** 
 Work with a company that is a world leader in industrial automation.
* **Global Presence:** 
 You will work in a truly global company with employees in more than 27 countries.
* **Sustainable Vision:** 
 Contribute to an automated world, reducing resource waste and promoting safety.
* **Professional Growth:** 
 Access opportunities for continuous learning and international career advancement.
* **Diverse and Inclusive:** 
 Join a workplace that values diversity and fosters an inclusive environment.
* **Stable, fast-growing employer:** 
 As part of Patricia Industries and connected to the Wallenberg family, Piab Group benefits from strong support and a commitment to long-term growth and sustainability.



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




 • Solution Architecture: Design and define end-to-end technical architecture for D365 F&O implementations, including integrations, customisations, and data migrations.
 



 • Technical Leadership: Provide guidance and oversight to technical teams; ensure adherence to architectural standards, coding best practices, and quality targets.
 



 • Stakeholder Engagement: Work with business users, functional consultants, and project managers to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
 



 • Customisation and Development: Oversee and participate in the development of custom modules, extensions, workflows, and reports using related technologies.
 



 • DevOps & Automation: Design and implement CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and automated deployment strategies using tools such as Azure DevOps, ARM templates
 



 • Integration: Architect and implement integrations between D365 F&O and other business systems (CRM, third-party applications, legacy systems) using Azure services, Logic Apps, Data Entities, and OData.
 



 • Data Management: Lead data migration planning, strategy, and execution, ensuring data integrity and security.
 



 • Performance Optimisation: Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, ensuring scalable and high-performing solutions.
 



 • Documentation: Produce and maintain technical design documents, architecture diagrams, and configuration guides.
 



 • Quality Assurance: Oversee technical testing, code reviews, and deployment processes.
 



 • Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with Microsoft’s D365 roadmap, recommending enhancements or upgrades to maintain system effectiveness. Be the point of contact with Microsoft for technical architecture, solutions, and escalations
 



 • Testing: Work closely with stakeholders to identify technical test scenarios and test cases. Lead the defect resolution.
 



 • Training: Contribute to the training strategy.
 



 • Go-live: Provide input for cut-over planning. Take part and lead in go-live activities within the scope of the role.
 



 • Maintenance & Support: Take part in maintenance, support activities related to the role scope, incident, problem & service request management
 



 • Process: Adhere to relevant processes like project methodology, solution change management, configuration & release management, deployment management, and post-production support processes. Align with project managers & support leaders for time planning, task execution, and prioritizations.
 



 • Forums: Take part in different related projects and support forums. Contribute with inputs to these forums with requirements management, solution management, testing, and support ticket resolution.
 



 • Hands-on approach: D365 ERP solution touches business processes. Therefore, a very hands-on approach is needed in this role.
 



  





**Key Requirements:** 




 • Possesses a relevant Bachelor's or Master's Degree.
 



 • 10+ years of relevant technical work experience within Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&O development and Azure Integration services.
 



 • Experience working in large and complex D365 ERP implementation projects is a must. At least able to demonstrate 2 large implementation projects.
 



 • Experience working with D365 maintenance and support in D365 is required.
 



 • Experience working with D365 data migration, integration is required.
 



 • Deep understanding of Azure core services (VMs, App Services, Functions, Logic Apps, AKS, Azure SQL, Cosmos DB, Storage, Virtual Networks, Security Centre, etc.)
 



 • Experience with cloud security, governance, and compliance
 



 • Proficient in scripting and automation (PowerShell, Azure CLI)
 



 • Familiarity with DevOps tools (Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions)
 



 • Experience in hybrid cloud and on-premises integration scenarios
 



 • Microsoft certifications in D365 F&O is an added advantage.
 



 • Experience working in international environments and assignments are necessary. Have experience working with Europe, the US, and Asia implementations (Global implementation)
 



 • Experience working with tools like Jira / HP ALM / ServiceNow, SharePoint is required.
 



 • Experience working in leading requirements, solution workshops.
 



 • Demonstrate solid ability to work collaboratively in a team.
 



 • Experience working with agile and waterfall methodologies. Thorough understanding of change, release, deploy, testing, training and IT service methodologies.
 



 • Able to understand business needs and translate business needs into tangible solutions.
 



 • Willingness to travel.
 



 • Experience from a B2B organisation is an advantage.
 



 • Be result-driven and have analytical skills.
 



 • Experience working with MS Word, PowerPoint, Excel and project-related tools.
 



 • Ability to multitask and manage various task elements simultaneously.
 



 • Excellent verbal and written communication skills, ability to communicate in a concise and professional manner.
 



 • It is required that the person is a good team player.
 



 • Fluent in English, both writing and speaking, any other language skills are an advantage.
 



  





**How to Apply:** 




 If you are passionate about innovation and want to make a difference in the world of automation, we would love to hear from you! Apply over your LinkedIn profile or use the following link to upload your CV.
 



 Please be advised that a valid work permit for the country we offer the open vacancy is required for non-EU citizens. Unfortunately, applications without a valid work permit cannot be considered.

title: Senior Account Manager, Surety Unit Sweden
description:
Do you want to try something else than working in a bank?
   

  

 Are you ready to move on from a trade finance position in a bank, financial institution, export company?
   

  

 Or just looking for a career in a global company with responsibility for a portfolio of Swedish surety clients?
   

  

 Atradius Surety Unit is a pan-European Surety provider with local service orientation. Atradius is currently marketing surety with local teams in the Nordic countries, France, Belgium and Luxemburg, Italy, Spain, Portugal, Germany, UK and the Netherlands. The team in Sweden, located in Stockholm, is looking for a Senior Account Manager.
   

  

 Apart from the manager, the Surety Team in Sweden consists of a highly skilled and experienced senior account manager and an administrator who performs independent administrative work. We are a small team and we work closely together and help each other when needed. We also have close cooperation with the Senior Manager of Financial underwriting for Surety in Northern Europe.
   

  

 Atradius is a market leading surety/bond provider in Europe and serves a wide portfolio of businesses of all sizes across different industries. Atradius provides the customer with a unique Surety partner, focused on supporting their domestic and European surety needs.
   

  

**Main Responsibilities**
 Being a Senior Account Manager in Surety you need to be hands-on operational with responsibility for customer and broker relationships and take a lead in sales generating activities. You have an interest in the Swedish and Nordic business environment and understand the risks associated with it. Apart from daily contact with customers and brokers, frequent interaction with other Atradius service account managers across the international network is vital to ensure excellent service.
   

  

* You will have direct customer responsibility for small to large Surety companies
* Ability to prioritize and organize own work and deliver to agreed targets upon set deadlines
* Be used to and feel comfortable to draft Financial Submissions
* Result driven personality with focus on business growth, profitability and relationship development
* A team player with capability to grow the business by opening new doors and exploring new opportunities
* Key contact and negotiator with customers and brokers


**The ideal candidate has:**
* Minimum 5 years experience, from the industry or financial sector
* Team player with an understanding of Swedish culture and business environment
* Relevant education and/or business courses
* Excellent language skills (fluent in Swedish and English)
* Ability to engage and communicate at executive level
* Proven ability to achieve financial targets and handle complex issues


**What we offer:**
* A great and challenging place to work: International, dynamic, transparent and informal.
* International environment
* Attractive terms of conditions. Salary in line with market conditions, variable pay scheme, pension scheme etc.
* Strong reputation in the market with high professional standards


**Are you interested?**
 Apply below as soon as possible.
   

  

 For further information please contact Sofie Hjorter sofie.hjorter@atradius.com
   

  

**Atradius**
 The Atradius Group provides trade credit insurance, surety and collections services worldwide, and has a presence through 160 offices in 52 countries. The products offered by Atradius protect companies around the world against the default risks associated with selling goods and services on credit.
   

  

 At Atradius, we believe in personal development and the Growth Mindset. Our Culture is based on teamwork, reliable accountability, constantly improving and unrivalled service. Read on more on our Career site: https://careers.atradius.com/en/careers.
   

  

**Equal opportunities for all**
 The success of our organisation stands with the quality of our people and the ideas they have. Insights and innovative solutions for our customers are the result of an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. That is why diversity is extremely important to Atradius. To ensure that all colleagues within Atradius can develop their qualities, we promote an inclusive culture in which everyone feels involved and valued. We encourage and welcome everyone to apply to our positions.
   

  

**I am Atradius! - Do you want to know who we are?**
 Get to know Atradius colleagues in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NnsgT04OpTU&t=4s
   

  

*Atradius is a global provider of credit insurance, bond and surety, collections and information services, with a strategic presence in over 50 countries. The products offered by Atradius protect companies around the world against the default risks associated with selling goods and services on credit. Atradius is a member of Grupo Catalana Occidente (GCO.MC), one of the largest insurers in Spain and one of the largest credit insurers in the world.*
*You can find further information on our website:* 
*https://group.atradius.com*

title: Account Executive, Deel HR | DACH
description:
**Who We Are Is What We Do.**
 Deel is the all-in-one payroll and HR platform for global teams. Our vision is to unlock global opportunity for every person, team, and business. Built for the way the world works today, Deel combines HRIS, payroll, compliance, benefits, performance, and equipment management into one seamless platform. With AI-powered tools and a fully owned payroll infrastructure, Deel supports every worker type in 150+ countries—helping businesses scale smarter, faster, and more compliantly.
   

  

 Among the largest globally distributed companies in the world, our team of 6,000 spans more than 100 countries, speaks 74 languages, and brings a connected and dynamic culture that drives continuous learning and innovation for our customers.
   

  

**Why should you be part of our success story?**
 As the fastest-growing Software as a Service (SaaS) company in history, Deel is transforming how global talent connects with world-class companies – breaking down borders that have traditionally limited both hiring and career opportunities. We're not just building software; we're creating the infrastructure for the future of work, enabling a more diverse and inclusive global economy. In 2024 alone, we paid $11.2 billion to workers in nearly 100 currencies and provided healthcare and benefits to workers in 109 countries—ensuring people get paid and protected, no matter where they are.
   

  

 Our momentum is reflected in our achievements and customer satisfaction: CNBC Disruptor 50, Forbes Cloud 100, Deloitte Fast 500, and repeated recognition on Y Combinator’s top companies list – all while maintaining a 4.83 average rating from 15,000 reviews across G2, Trustpilot, Captera, Apple and Google.
   

  

 Your experience at Deel will be a career accelerator. At the forefront of the global work revolution, you'll tackle complex challenges that impact millions of people's working lives. With our momentum—backed by a $12 billion valuation and $1 B in Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) in just over five years—you'll drive meaningful impact while building expertise that makes you a sought-after leader in the transformation of global work.
   

  

**Summary:**
 The Deel HR Sales Team supports the Core Sales Organization with product-specific opportunities. In this role, you will support all segments (SMB to Enterprise), covering both new and existing business within the DACH region. This role focuses on growing our HR-specific product in the market. You will own your direct pipeline as well as the full Deel HR pipeline for the region.
   

  

 As an Account Executive for Deel HR, you will be responsible for driving sales growth by developing and nurturing client relationships in the region. This is a unique opportunity to be part of the founding sales team for Deel HR—the fastest-growing product line within one of the fastest-growing tech companies in history.
   

  

 Meeting or exceeding monthly and yearly revenue targets is essential, with the ultimate goal of securing new business, expanding existing accounts, and positioning the organization as a trusted industry partner.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Lead and own our Deel HR expansion within the DACH Region
* Create pipe across all horsemen; AEs, AMs, SDRs, Partners, Marketing and more
* Grow and own your own targeted account list
* Manage the customer buying journey from start to finish, providing guidance and subject matter expertise to prospective customers
* Meet or exceed quarterly and yearly revenue targets
* Qualify and understand client requirements to adapt solutions and meet their needs
* Keep CRM system up to date with customer information, forecasts, and pipeline data so we can learn more about our business and our sales process


**Qualifications:**
* 3+ years of sales experience
* Ideally, previous experience in HR tech sales
* A proven track record of developing a greenfield territory, executing across the full sales cycle, and adding net new logos
* Experience in cross-functional teams to ensure customer success and satisfaction
* Desire to work for a fast-paced startup and take on increasing levels of responsibility
* Fluent in German and English


**Total Rewards**
 Our workforce deserves fair and competitive pay that meets them where they are. With scalable benefits, rewards, and perks, our total rewards programs reflect our commitment to inclusivity and access for all.
   

  

**Some things you’ll enjoy**
* Stock grant opportunities dependent on your role, employment status and location
* Additional perks and benefits based on your employment status and country
* The flexibility of remote work, including optional WeWork access


 At Deel, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that values diversity and positively encourage applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of race, religion, sex, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, pregnancy or maternity or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
   

  

*Unless otherwise agreed, we will communicate with job applicants using Deel-specific emails, which include @* 
*deel.com* 
*and other acquired company emails like @* 
*payspace.com* 
*and @* 
*paygroup.com* 
*. You can view the most up-to-date job listings at Deel by visiting* 
*our careers page* 
*.
   

  

 Deel is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to cultivating a diverse and inclusive workplace that reflects different abilities, backgrounds, beliefs, experiences, identities and perspectives.
   

  

 Deel will provide accommodation on request throughout the recruitment, selection and assessment process for applicants with disabilities. If you require accommodation, please inform our Talent Acquisition Team at recruiting@deel.com of the nature of the accommodation that you may require, to ensure your equal participation.*
 We use Covey as part of our hiring and/or promotional processes. As part of the evaluation process, we provide Covey with job requirements and candidate-submitted applications. Certain features of the platform may qualify it as an Automated Employment Decision Tool (AEDT) under applicable regulations. For positions in New York City, our use of Covey complies with NYC Local Law 144.
   

  

 We began using Covey Scout for Inbound on March 30, 2025.
   

  

 For more information about our data protection practices, please visit our Privacy Policy. You can review the independent bias audit report covering our use of Covey here: https://getcovey.com/nyc-local-law-144

title: Dynamics D365 Solution Architect - Tietoevry Tech Services (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Vill du bli en del av ett team som brinner för att hjälpa organisationer att optimera sina processer, förbättra beslutsfattandet och uppnå bättre affärsresultat genom digital transformation? Vårt team specialiserar oss på att tillhandahålla skräddarsydda affärslösningar genom Microsoft Dynamics-plattformen. Bli en del av oss som lösningsarkitekt inom Microsoft Dynamics!
   

  

**När du börjar hos Tietoevry Tech Services som lösningsarkitekt inom Microsoft Dynamics:**
 Kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i utformningen, implementeringen och optimeringen av lösningar över Microsoft Dynamics 365 (D365) för att tillgodose affärsbehov. Du kommer jobba nära flera stakeholders för att förstå affärskrav och leverera innovativa, skalbara och robusta lösningar.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga Ansvarsområden**
 Lösningsdesign & Arkitektur:
   

  

* Leda design och arkitektur av end-to-end-lösningar inom Microsoft Dynamics 365, Finance & Supply Chain, inklusive CE
* Översätta komplexa affärskrav till skalbara, underhållsbara och effektiva tekniska designer
* Säkerställa att föreslagna lösningar följer arkitekturella bästa praxis, säkerhetsstandarder och efterlevnadskrav


**Kundkonsultation & Kravinsamling**
* Engagera med kunder och intressenter för att förstå deras affärsbehov, utmaningar och mål
* Genomföra workshops och upptäcktsessioner för att samla in detaljerade krav och förfina lösningsdesigner


**Implementering & Integration**
* Överse implementeringen av Dynamics 365-lösningar, inklusive konfiguration, anpassning och integration med andra system (t.ex. Power Platform, Azure)
* Säkerställa en sömlös integration med tredjepartssystem och applikationer


**Teknisk Ledning & Vägledning**
* Tillhandahålla teknisk ledning och vägledning till utvecklingsteam, säkerställa anpassning till den övergripande arkitektoniska visionen
* Mentorera juniora konsulter och utvecklare för att säkerställa framgångsrik leverans av projekt


**Kvalitetssäkring & Testning**
* Definiera och upprätthålla kvalitetsstandarder för lösningsdesign och utveckling
* Leda utvecklingen av teststrategier och planer för att säkerställa framgångsrik driftsättning och användargodkännande


**Kontinuerlig Förbättring & Innovation**
* Hålla sig uppdaterad med Microsoft Dynamics-uppdateringar och framväxande teknologier för att driva kontinuerlig förbättring och innovation
* Identifiera möjligheter att utnyttja nya verktyg, metoder eller plattformar för att förbättra affärsresultat


**Projektledningsstöd**
* Samarbeta med projektledare för att säkerställa att lösningar levereras i tid, inom scope och inom budget
* Hjälpa till att hantera projektrisker, problem och förändringar, säkerställa effektiv kommunikation med intressenter


**Presales**
* Driva och förbereda demo för kunder, ta fram estimatt, business case och förstudier resultat


*Anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i en säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018: 585) kan därför genomföras innan beslut om anställning.*
**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Mångårig erfarenhet av att arbeta som lösningsarkitekt eller teknisk konsult med Microsoft Dynamics 365 (Finance & Operations, Customer Engagement, etc.)
* Bevisad erfarenhet av att designa och leverera storskaliga Microsoft Dynamics 365-lösningar för olika branscher
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Power BI, Power Automate och andra komponenter i Power Platform.
* Expertis inom Microsoft Dynamics 365-moduler (t.ex. Finance, Supply Chain, CE)
* Stark förståelse för Dynamics 365-anpassning, konfiguration och integration med andra Microsoft-teknologier (Power Platform, Azure, etc.)
* Konsultmässig med dokumenterad förmåga att samla krav och bygga relationer med kunder
* Talar svenska och engelska flytande.


**Certifieringar**
* - Microsoft Certified: Dynamics 365 + Power Platform Solution Architect är meriterande.
* - Andra relevanta certifieringar inom Dynamics 365 eller Azure.


 Som person hoppas vi att du är kommunikativ och har en förmåga att förklara komplexa tekniska koncept för icke-tekniska intressenter. Vi ser också att du är en lagspelare, nyfiken, social och serviceminded.
   

  

**Vi Erbjuder Dig**
 Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv! Vi erbjuder dig en möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en snabbt växande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en viktig del för att du ska bli framgångsrik. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt sätt att arbeta. Slutligen tror vi också på nyfikenhet och konstant lärande som en livsstil där du behöver skola om dig varje dag när nya möjligheter dyker upp.
   

  

**Blev du inspirerad?**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Bifoga ditt CV eller LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmanar dig att söka redan idag. Om du har några frågor angående denna roll, vänligen kontakta anställande chef, Norman Fromy, norman.fromy@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Hoppas vi hörs snart!
   

  

*Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.*
*Tietoevry tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*
**Om Tietoevry Tech Services**
 Tietoevry Tech Services är en ledande leverantör av transformations- och IT-drifttjänster, med fokus på nordiska privata och offentliga kunder inom olika branscher.
   

  

 Med vårt kompletta utbud av digitala lösningar – inklusive applikationer, multicloud, data & AI samt säkerhetstjänster – hjälper vi företag att utvecklas och håller de nordiska samhällena i gång.
   

  

 Vi är ett globalt team med över 7 000 experter från mer än 50 nationaliteter och levererar tjänster till våra kunder genom att kombinera globala kapabiliteter med nordisk närhet. Ledd av våra värderingar – jämlikhet, transparens och tillit – strävar vi efter att vara den bästa möjliga arbetsplatsen.
   

  

 Nu söker vi talangfulla personer som vill följa med oss på vår spännande resa mot att bli ett självständigt bolag och tillsammans forma det digitala landskapet i Norden.
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Market Solution Manager, vikariat
description:
**DeLaval Sales AB söker en Market Solution Manager, 1års vikariat**
 Vill du ha ett omväxlande, ansvarsfullt och självständigt arbete inom svensk mjölkproduktion? vill du arbeta för ett globalt företag där du bidrar till en mer hållbar livsmedelsproduktion? Samt vill du vara en del av ett internationellt team och brinner både för marknad, sälj och produktutveckling? Då kan denna tjänst vara någonting för dig!
   

  

 Du har i rollen på DeLaval möjligheter att påverka Sveriges lantbrukares framtid och ekonomi – du kan göra skillnad! Vi erbjuder dig ett ansvarsfullt och självständigt arbete i en trivsam och öppen företagskultur som präglas av god gemenskap och en passion för vad vi gör.
   

  

 Vår ordinarie Market Solution Manager InService, Performance Plan och MQAH ska efter årsskiftet gå på föräldraledighet och vi söker nu hennes vikarie. Vi eftersöker en initiativrik, självständig och engagerad kollega med intresse för dagens moderna och snabbt utvecklande teknologi inom mjölkproduktion.
   

  

 I denna roll arbetar du inom produktområdena InService, Performance Plan och MQAH, där du planerar och genomför marknadsföringsaktiviteter och säljkampanjer i samarbete med marknadsavdelningen, andra Solution Managers och den lokala säljorganisationen. Du planerar utbildningar och genomför dessa samt ger direkt stöd till säljorganisationen och deltar även i vissa kundmöten.Du kommer dessutom samarbeta med kollegor i andra europeiska marknadsområden. Du är en del av den lokala organisationen i Sverige och är involverad i det europeiska Market Development teamet.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Kanske jobbar du idag i en liknande roll inom jordbruk eller service eller har på annat sätt skaffat dig kunskap inom teknik och lantbruk som är relevant för tjänsten. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper
   

  

**Är Du**
* En självgående person som jobbar proaktivt och kan ta eget ansvar för ditt produktsortiment.
* Strukturerad med förmåga att planera och prioritera.
* Kundorienterad — har en tydlig förståelse för mjölkböndernas behov och förväntningar.


**Dina kvalifikationer/kompetenser**
* God kännedom om jordbruk/mjölkproduktion med god teknisk förståelse. Utbildning inom lantbruk (agronom, lantmästare) eller motsvarande är meriterande
* Kommersiellt tänkande med handlingskraft, struktur och systematik för att driva dina ansvarsområden och stödja säljteamet
* Systemorienterat tänkande och IT-kompetens på användarnivå
* Starka samarbetsförmågor över organisationen, är lösningsorienterad, utåtriktad och är en pedagogisk kommunikatör som vill arbeta i olika team
* Arbetslivserfarenhet eller annan erfarenhet från lantbruksbranschen är ett krav
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska både i tal och skrift


**Uppgifter och ansvarsområden**
* Koordinering av Performance Plan inom Sverige
* Administrera produkten InService, som omfattar servicekontrakt för alla produkter inom portföljen
* Koordinera och leda kommersiella aktiviteter och initiativ för sortimentet: prissättning, utbildningsplan, marknadsförings- och kommunikationsplan, kvalitets-, sälj- och service KPI-uppföljning.
* Säkerställa lönsam tillväxt för sortimentet i enlighet med företagets strategiska riktning
* Utvärdera marknadstrender, konkurrenssituation och kundernas behov
* Analysera affärsmodeller för att stödja produktutbudet


**Övrigt**
 Det här är en visstidsanställning på heltid, 1år, med placering vid DeLavals huvudkontor i Tumba, söder om Stockholm. Vi erbjuder en hybrid arbetsplatsmodell, som ger viss flexibilitet att arbeta på distans. Resor förekommer både inom Sverige och utomlands förekommer, B-körkort är en förutsättning för tjänsten.
   

  

 Har du frågor gällande tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef , Thomas Poulsen telefon +45 2780 3180.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan senast 21 september 2025.**
 Om DeLaval
   

  

 Vår vision är att möjliggöra hållbar livsmedelsproduktion. Som ett företag som bygger på innovation arbetar vi ständigt med att hitta sätt att hjälpa våra kunder, mjölkproducenter, att göra mer med mindre genom att tillhandahålla världsledande mjölkningsutrustning och lösningar.
   

  

 Idag har DeLaval cirka 4500 passionerade yrkesverksamma som verkar på mer än 100 marknader runt om i världen. DeLaval är en del av Tetra Laval-gruppen. Välkommen att läsa mer om företagets kärnvärden och visioner på: www.corporate.delaval.com .

title: R&D Team Leader/Manager – MACH Valve Control Team
description:
**Description**


**The opportunity**  

You will lead a team of R&D engineers responsible for developing embedded solutions for high-performance control systems, supporting the MACH platform. This team belongs to the MACH Valve Control and Valve Electronics design organization, which is part of the Grid Integration MACH unit, serving broad range of Power Electronics applications (HVDC, Grid Power Quality Solutions).

  

Our success is made possible by the dedication and competence of our people. Knowing this means we need leaders with a focus on developing and empowering their team and dedication to the Hitachi Energy company values. We offer you an exciting and dynamic role with close collaboration with other departments and teams at Hitachi Energy globally.

**How you’ll make an impact**
=============================

* Manage the Valve Control team within MACH Valve Control & Valve Electronics design organization
* The primary responsibilities of the team include developing control algorithms for power electronics applications, implementing high-speed communication links, and designing modular software and FPGA firmware.
* Your team will work on end-to-end development in Software and FPGA design, closely connected with hardware platform, starting with requirements management, prototype creation, risk management, testing up to serial production and maintenance.
* Proactively evolve with - and beyond - industry standards, quality, cybersecurity.
* Work with life cycle management, including obsolescence management.
* Review & follow-up with the project team/stakeholders for the team’s deliverables, as per the processes.
* Responsible for achieving KPI’s for the team (e.g., On Time Delivery, Quality, Efficiency / Productivity etc.)
* Be part of the recruitment and onboarding process for the team members. Set and follow up on annual people’s goals, time reporting, and salary review.

**Your background**
===================

* The successful candidate shall have an M.Sc. or B.Sc. in Engineering or similar area, with background in hardware/software/embedded development or similar fields.
* Proven experience in R&D and preferably from managing an R&D team.
* Experience in embedded systems development and R&D processes is required in this position.
* Ability to work in multi-cultural and multi-national teams.
* Experience on functional leadership is a plus (Technical Leader or Project Management roles)
* As you will be part of a global business, fluency in written and spoken English is required.
* Prior knowledge of MACH platform or HVDC Valve Control or Power Electronics Control technologies is an advantage but not a must.

**More about us**
=================


Are you ready for a new exciting challenge? Does the above description sound like you? Don’t delay – apply today!

  

Recruiting Manager Mariusz Wojcik, mariusz.a.wojcik@hitachienergy.com, will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives – Sveriges Ingenjörer: Mikael Hjort, +46 107-38 29 86; Ledarna: Frank Hollstedt, +46 107-38 70 43; Unionen: Fredrik Holmgren, +46 107-38 21 85. All other questions can be directed to Talent Acquisition Gustaf Hedström, gustaf.hedstrom@hitachienergy.com

**Qualified individuals with a disability may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Hitachi Energy career site as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by completing a** **general inquiry form** **on our website. Please include your contact information and specific details about your required accommodation to support you during the job application process.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**This is solely for job seekers with disabilities requiring accessibility assistance or an accommodation in the job application process. Messages left for other purposes will not receive a response.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

title: Vice President Assistant
description:
*At Tetra Pak we commit to making food safe and available, everywhere; and we protect what's good – protecting food, protecting people, and protecting the planet. By doing so we touch millions of people's lives every day.*

*And we need people like you to make it happen.*


***We empower you to reach your potential with opportunities to make an impact to be proud of – for food, people and the planet.***

**Job Summary**
---------------



Processing Solutions & Equipment (PSE) is a part of Tetra Pak Group and on a mission to be the integrated industrial food solutions leader by:


* Delivering competitive integrated food and liquid food solutions that satisfy a customer's own market need
* Delivering processing excellence across relevant categories
* Using automation and digital to improve total-cost-of-ownership and quality for customers by delivering integrated line and value chain solutions

  



Join us as Vice President assistant and step into a fast-paced, fun, and international environment where every day brings new connections, challenges, and opportunities. If you thrive on collaboration, love building networks across borders, and want to grow in a role that truly matters - this is your moment.

  



We are looking for a professional administrator who will provide support to the Vice Presidents and management team, to enable smooth-running and efficient business. In this role you will be the point of contact for the organisation, both internally and externally. You will have the opportunity to impact on the management team deliveries and drive projects of your own.

  



This position is based in Lund, Sweden. In this role, you will report to the Manager PSE Admin Centre & VIP Visits, PSE Strategic Programs.

**What you will do**
--------------------


* Manage the Vice President calendar and agenda across different global time zones to ensure optimal use of time and efforts in a proactive and independent manner
* Drive and support in organizing events, workshops and meetings
* Arrange cost-efficient travels including travel arrangements and manage travel reports
* Support internal communication across the department
* Support in producing, reviewing and administration of presentations
* Drive improvements in administrative ways of working and secure implementation within the organisation
* Support in the coordination, follow up and documentation
**We believe you have**
-----------------------


* High school diploma in administration or University degree in Administration, or equivalent combined with experience from administration
* Minimum of 5 years of experience from similar roles in complex organizations
* Experience working with senior management team
* The capability to drive projects on your own, interacting with stakeholders’ cross organizations.
* Proficient in Microsoft Office software and possess the ability to quickly grasp and learn new technical tools & experience from working with AI-tools
* Fluent in English both written and spoken

  



As a person you have integrity, excellent communication skills and have a proactive approach to handle your work. You are a people person with great internal and external stakeholder engagement and good networking skills. You have a service-oriented and flexible attitude to ensure that the Vice President and team members are well supported. You are a finisher but still pay attention to details and have passion for administrational excellence. To be structured and quality oriented comes natural to you.

  



The leadership team will benefit from your proactive approach and clear communication. In addition, you are a good team player and listener, attentive to arising needs where you can make a difference

**We Offer You**


* A variety of exciting challenges with ample opportunities for development and training in a truly global landscape
* A culture that pioneers a spirit of innovation where our industry experts drive visible results
* An equal opportunity employment experience that values diversity and inclusion
* Market competitive compensation and benefits with flexible working arrangements

  


**Apply Now**



If you are inspired to be part of our promise to protect what’s good; for food, people, and the planet, apply through our careers page at https://jobs.tetrapak.com/.



This job posting expires on **2025-09-17.**



To know more about the position, contact Hiring Manager Annika Hernestam at annika.hernestam@tetrapak.com



If you need any information about your application, please contact Sara Johannesson at sara.johannesson@tetrapak.com



For trade union information, contact Unionen/Lisbeth Larsson at +46 46 36 2320 or
  

Sveriges Ingenjörer/Lars Haraldsson at +46 46 36 2533.

  


*Diversity, equity, and inclusion is an everyday part of how we work. We give people a place to belong and support to thrive, an environment where everyone can be comfortable being themselves and has equal opportunities to grow and succeed. We embrace difference, celebrate people for who they are, and for the diversity they bring that helps us better understand and connect with our customers and communities worldwide.*

title: AUTOMOTIVE DIAGNOSTIC/METHOD/PARTS ENGINEER OR TECHNICAL WRITER
description:
Sigma Technology* All open positions
* Open Positions details
**JOB DESCRIPTION**
-------------------


Sigma Technology Information is seeking automotive professionals, especially if you specialize in diagnostics, methods, parts, or technical writing.

* Do you have technical knowledge from the automotive industry?
* Do you like describing complex technology in a simple way?
* Do you have a feeling for user-friendliness and information flow?
* Do you want to work with new exciting technical products before they reach the market?


Then you would probably be perfect to join our growing team and help develop, update, and maintain information of various sorts for several customers in the Gothenburg area. You may be a former car mechanic, or you may have a university degree. It doesn’t matter, as long as you have the technical background needed for this job.

**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------


We hope that you to have:

* Technical knowledge about motor vehicles and competence
* An understanding of a mechanic’s need for information and an ability to create this information in English
* A curiosity for technology
* Social competence, as you would work in a consultant role
* Good knowledge of English, Swedish is a merit
**PREFERRED ADDITIONAL SKILLS, PERSONAL TRAITS, EXPERIENCE**
------------------------------------------------------------


A successful candidate probably has some of the following qualifications:

* Previous knowledge of one or more automotive aftermarket systems
* For diagnostic engineer positions: knowledge of systems such as DSA, Grade X, wiring diagrams, etc.
* For service method engineer positions: experience from technical drawings, 3D CAD software, technical illustrations, etc.
* For parts engineer positions: knowledge of 3D CAD software, Windchill, Teamcenter, technical drawings, etc.
* For technical writer positions: knowledge of XML, CMS, Adobe Suite, information architecture, etc.
**WE OFFER**
------------


At Sigma Technology, we put you as a consultant in focus. We offer you good opportunities for development and a variety of assignments and customers, as well as offering events and benefits that suit you personally.

Automotive diagnostic/method/parts engineer or technical writer

title: Power Drive System Engineer
description:
**Techster Solutions** befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst **4+** års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.

  

Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning**

Vi söker en Senior Power Drive System Engineer till en kund som arbetar med utvecklingen av nästa generations teknologi inom pumpar:

* Intelligent pumps (software-driven)
* Minska energiförbrukning
* Self-cleaning pumps

**Kvalifikationer:**

* Du har erfarenhet inom Power drive system och VFD variable frequency drives.
* Du har kompetens inom embedded software (C++).
* Du har bakgrund inom power/drive systems samt electrical motor control.
* Du är samarbetsinriktad och kommunikativ, och passar i ett multinationellt team.
* Du är en motor control-expert.

**Ansökan**  

Tror du att du är **Techster Solutions** nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
--------------------------


Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.


Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Test Engineer Specialist
description:
September 3, 2025
Full Time
Sweden
Posted 14 hours ago
We are hiring **Test Engineer Specialist**for the position based in **Gothenburg, Sweden (onsite)**.


**Educational Qualification:** Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Automotive Engineering, or related field, or equivalent professional experience.


**Job Summary:**



We are looking for a **Test Engineer Specialist** with strong expertise in EV charging systems testing .The role focuses on physical testing of electric vehicle (EV) charging stations (EVSEs), with an emphasis on developing innovative test strategies and methodologies. The ideal candidate will bring hands-on technical experience combined with strong project management and stakeholder engagement skills.



**Required Experience/Competences:**


* **5–8 years** of professional experience in **testing,** preferably within **EV charging or automotive electronics.**
* Proficiency with **Canalyzer, Wireshark, and Python.**
* Strong understanding of **EV charging standards (ISO 15118, IEC 61851, OCPP).**
* Experience in physical **vehicle and charger testing** (preferred over virtual testing).
* Familiarity with general **testing methodologies** and **tools**.
* Project management experience within **testing** or **development projects.**
* Valid car **driving license** (mandatory).


**Soft Skills:**


* Fluent in English and Swedish (spoken and written).
* Strong communication and leadership qualities.
* Proactive, innovative, and flexible mindset.
* Ability to mentor, train, and influence within a growing organization.
* Highly organized with problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
### **Job Features**


Job Category Quality Assurance (QA) and Software Engineering

title: Staff Engineer with GO
description:
### **We're not just building an ecommerce platform — we’re reshaping how fashion & lifestyle brands scale globally.**

  

Our API-first, headless SaaS platform supports over **300 brands** in delivering localized, high-performance shopping experiences across **120+ countries**. Backed by a **50 million SEK investment** from the **H&M Group**, we power leading names like **COS**, **ARKET**, **& Other Stories**, **Weekday**, **Nudie Jeans**, and **Paul Smith**. Brands like **Holzweiler** trust Centra to run operations in **20+ markets** with small, efficient teams—a reflection of the platform’s flexibility and efficiency.

#### **Why join Centra?**

**Building meaningful solutions**


Here, developers are deeply involved in solving real business challenges—not just writing code. You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams to build solutions that directly impact the success of internationally recognized brands.

**Engineering that challenges and inspires**


You’ll tackle performance-critical systems, apply domain-driven design and use modern architecture patterns. Whether it’s designing a GraphQL API, or optimizing cross-border flows, your contributions will have both technical depth and business relevance. You’ll take real ownership of your work and help shape technical direction.


We work in cross-functional teams with a focus on fast feedback, clear communication, and minimal bureaucracy.

#### **Your mission**


As a Staff Engineer you'll help shape Centra's platform by leading the technical design and long-term vision for your team's domain ensuring its proper place in the application architecture to allow flexible and fast growth. You'll write clean code, mentor and grow our engineers by establishing best practices and raising the bar for technical excellence across the entire organization. You'll partner with Engineering and Product Managers to identify future technical needs and help shape the long-term technical roadmap.

#### **What we’re looking for**

* A proven track record of designing, building and operating complex services.
* Excellent communication skills in English, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* A problem-solving mindset and sharp attention to detail.
* Strong experience with GO and software engineering best practices.

#### **Our tech-stack**

* **Languages:** GO, PHP 8.3, GraphQL
* **Databases:** MySQL, ElasticSearch, Redis
* **Infrastructure & Architecture:** Kubernetes, EKS, AWS, GCP, DigitalOcean
* **Tools:** GitHub & GitLab

#### **Benefits**

* Enel-med medical insurance
* MyBenefit Cafeteria
* Cutting-edge equipment (MacBook, AirPods, etc.)
* Office massages and wellness perks to help you recharge
* Support for learning: budget for courses, conferences, and self-development
* A multicultural and inclusive environment with regular team-building events
* A casual dress code and pet-friendly workspace
* Attractive referral program

#### **Our recruitment process**


1. **Introductory Interview**: Get to know each other, and discuss your experience & expectations. (*Online, 30–45 min*)

  

2. **Technical Interview**: Dive into technical discussions. (*Online, 1.5–2h*)


3. **Cultural Fit Interview**: Explore your alignment with our values and meet the team. (*On-site, 1h*)

##### **Curious about life at Centra?**


Follow us on Instagram, LinkedIn, and visit centra.com to learn more about our team, culture, and the brands we support. Explore what we’re building and how you can be part of it at centra.dev!

title: Integration Engineer
description:
**About Sana**
==============

We're on a mission to revolutionize how humans access knowledge through artificial intelligence. Throughout history, breakthroughs in knowledge sharing—from the Library of Alexandria to the printing press to Google—have been pivotal drivers of human progress. Today, as the volume of human knowledge grows exponentially, making it accessible and actionable remains one of humanity's most critical challenges. We're building a future where knowledge isn't just more accessible—it's a catalyst for achieving the previously impossible. If all of this sounds exciting, you’re in the right place.

**About the role**
==================


Join Sana as our founding Integration Engineer and shape the future of how enterprise customers experience our platform. Integrations — connecting Sana Learn with HRIS, content libraries, and other critical enterprise systems — are not just add-ons, but core product features that drive customer value and trust. In this high-impact role, you’ll take full ownership of building, maintaining, and scaling integrations that blend seamlessly into our core product, setting the gold standard for reliability and user experience.


You’ll be the architect behind our integration strategy, ensuring every connection is robust, secure, and future-proof. Your work will directly influence Sana’s ability to deliver enterprise integrations. You’ll own and evolve our key integration repositories, and your contributions will be foundational to Sana’s long-term success as we scale.

**In this role, you will**
==========================

* Lead the design, development, and maintenance of scalable integrations between Sana Learn and leading HR systems, content providers, and other enterprise platforms
* Take full ownership of our integration codebases, driving best practices, code quality, and strategic direction for all integrations
* Build integrations that are indistinguishable from core product features — seamless, reliable, and deeply aligned with Sana’s product standards
* Work with modern protocols and standards, ensuring secure and flexible user provisioning and custom attribute mapping across various platforms
* Collaborate closely with product, customer, and other engineering teams to deeply understand integration requirements and deliver solutions that exceed enterprise expectations
* Troubleshoot, optimize, and future-proof integrations, ensuring they are ready to scale with Sana’s rapid growth
* Write clean, maintainable TypeScript code, working extensively with JSON and APIs, and contribute to clear, comprehensive documentation
* Champion in-house integration expertise, setting the foundation for Sana’s long-term reliability

**Your background looks something like**
========================================

* 3+ years of experience in software engineering, with a focus on integrations, APIs, or backend development
* Expert-level proficiency in TypeScript and JSON-based APIs
* Proven track record in building and maintaining integrations with enterprise systems
* Deep understanding of user provisioning and authentication protocols, custom attribute mapping, and security best practices for enterprise integrations
* Experience owning and evolving codebases in a collaborative GitHub environment
* Ability to debug complex API payloads and troubleshoot integration issues across multiple systems
* Passion for writing clean, maintainable, and scalable code for mission-critical integrations
* Excellent communication skills and a collaborative, entrepreneurial mindset

**Nice to have**
================

* Experience with content provisioning and caching strategies
* Familiarity with SQL and tracking data lineage for user attributes across APIs and manual updates


We encourage you to apply even if you do not believe you meet every single qualification. Not all strong candidates will meet every single qualification as listed.

**What We Offer**
=================

* Help shape AI's future alongside brilliant minds from Notion, Dropbox, Slack, Databricks, Google, McKinsey, and BCG.
* Competitive salary complemented with a transparent and highly competitive options program.
* Swift professional growth in an evolving environment, supported by a culture of continuous feedback and mentorship from senior leaders.
* Work with talented teammates across 5+ countries, collaborate with customers globally and work in our offices in New York, London and Stockholm.
* Regular team gatherings and events (recently in Italy and South Africa)

title: Field Service Engineer (m/f/d) - Sweden
company: ASM Assembly Systems GmbH & Co. KG
description:
Welcome to ASMPT. Here you are on a direct route to the digital age. With 12,000 employees worldwide, we are a technological process partner for the electronics industry and have our finger on the pulse of innovative automation strategies.


Thanks to our smart solutions, our passionate teams continuously challenge the technical status quo, thereby setting new standards for the production of smartphones, computers, networks, autonomous vehicles, smart machines and cutting-edge medical and energy technology.


The journey to create the Integrated Smart Factory can only be made with passion and curious professionals like you. Join us and you will also benefit from a corporate culture in which your ideas are not only given room to flourish and are appreciated, they also become optimum solutions.


You will feel this every day in your professional life.


Shape the electronics manufacturing and automation trends of the future as


**Field Service Engineer (m/f/d) - Sweden**
===========================================


**The ASMPT team is looking to immediately fill the following position at its Sollentuna location!**
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  

  

With our SIPLACE SMT placement machines and DEK stencil printers we support electronics manufacturers all over the world on their path to the Smart #1 SMT Factory based on Industry 4.0 concepts.  

As the industry’s innovation and technology leader, our product portfolio stands for top quality, process integration and flexible best-in-class solutions. Our vision: We enable the digital world!

  

**Your responsibilities include:**
----------------------------------


* Deliver exceptional service to our customers
* Perform both preventive and corrective maintenance on ASMPT equipment
* Install and support the start-up of SMT equipment, including related accessories
* Conduct customer training and instruction on sold equipment, focusing on delivering both internal and external training sessions
* Carry out retrofits and upgrades—both software and hardware—on installed equipment
* Develop and maintain strong relationships with new and existing customers while identifying their needs
* Accurately document service, hotline, and project activities in the CRM system, aiming to improve service processes internally and externally
* Forward and monitor error messages and open issues from service and hotline activities, ensuring timely follow-up and resolution
* Be responsible for performing preventive as well as reactive service and maintenance on ASMPT-Equipment


**Your qualifications:**
------------------------


* Have proven experience in servicing, installing, and maintaining manufacturing equipment
* Have previous experience with SMT equipment is considered a strong advantage
* A genuine interest in technology and continuous learning
* An understanding of IT infrastructure with basic knowledge of Microsoft applications
* Strong interpersonal skills, a positive attitude, and a collaborative team spirit
* Have excellent communication, analytical, and organizational skills, with a clear focus on customer service
* Be Proficient in English, both spoken and written
* Have the ability to prioritize tasks and work consistently toward defined goals
* Be able to travel across European countries and be in possession of a valid driver’s license


**You want to drive forward the development of the Smart Factory with your ideas, in a great team, networked with leading international technology companies?**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  

  

In addition to a highly specialized and future oriented business you will also find challenging tasks and a high level of autonomy and responsibility. Our excellent working atmosphere proves that we live up to our values. And of course, we offer attractive compensation and fringe benefits.

  

**Did we raise your interest?**
-------------------------------

  

  

ASMPT is committed to equal employment opportunity and equal pay regardless of e.g. race, colour, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, disability or gender identity.  

  

To apply for this position, please upload your CV and cover letter to our recruiting platform.  

We are looking forward to hear from you!

  

Apply online now **We are looking forward to your compelling application!**

title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
*Drivs du av att se dina idéer bli verklighet? Välkommen till vår spännande och teknikintensiva värld.*


Din roll


Som Software Quality Assurance Engineer (SQAE) blir du en nyckelperson i vårt kvalitetsarbete, där du arbetar nära projekten för att säkerställa att vår programvara uppfyller både interna och externa standarder och kundkrav. I rollen ansvarar du för kvalitetssäkring av mjukvaruleveranser, stöd till designgranskare och utveckling av effektiva processer som främjar smidigare projekt. Du följer projekten från release till färdig produkt, säkerställer att uppsatta planer och mål uppfylls och har nära kontakt med kunder.


Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:

* Säkerställa att processer och dokumentation uppfyller krav enligt branschstandarder (exempelvis RTCA/DO-178)
* Delta i kvalitetssäkringsaktiviteter som inkluderar kvalitetsstandarder, metoder, procedurer och verktyg
* Dokumentera kvalitetsavvikelser och upprätthålla ett register över utförda aktiviteter och lösningar
* Dokumentera och verkställa nödvändiga aktiviteter i enlighet med kontraktet
* Rapportera löpande om framsteg och insikter inom kvalitetsarbetet till andra delar av organisationen


Din profil


Vi söker en person som tidigare har arbetet med systematiskt kvalitetsarbete och som kan driva dialog med kravställare på ett tydligt och självständigt sätt. Du har erfarenhet av metoder, processer, planer, standarder och verktyg inom kvalitetsledning och arbetar strukturerat och ordningsamt. Vi värdesätter att du är initiativtagande, trygg i dig själv och kan fatta beslut när det behövs. Du har en pedagogisk förmåga och god kommunikationsförmåga, vilket gör att du kan stödja och guida kollegor i kvalitetsarbetet.


För att lyckas i rollen har du:

* Erfarenhet av systematisk kvalitetsledning inom system, där du också haft en beslutsfattande roll
* Utbildning på minst högskolenivå
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska


Det är även meriterande om du har:

* Erfarenhet av konfigurationshantering
* Utbildning i RTCA/DO-178C eller motsvarande kvalitetsstandarder
* Erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling


Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.


Vad du blir en del av


Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.


Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 26,100 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.


Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här.

*Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.*
